17303.question: How To Glue Plexiglas
17303.gt: To glue plexiglas, start by cleaning the surface with mild soap and water and drying it with a clean cloth. Next, fit the glass pieces together to ensure a snug fit and secure them in place with masking tape or clamps. Then, use a 25 gauge syringe to apply methylene chloride glue to the joint between the two glass pieces. Finally, let the glue set for 24-48 hours to ensure a secure bond. After the glue is set, you can use fine-grit sandpaper to smooth out any rough patches on the joint.
17303.pred: To glue plexiglas, first, you need to clean the surface of the plexiglas with acetone. Then, apply a small amount of glue to the surface and press the two pieces of plexiglas together. Finally, let the glue dry for a few minutes before using the plexiglas.

17508.question: How To Paint a Wall
17508.gt: Before you start painting your wall, remove outlet covers and light switches as well cover adjacent surfaces with painter's tape. Then, apply a primer to help the paint stick as well as cut down on the number of coats you’ll have to apply. Wait 4 hours for the primer to dry, then paint the trim by hand. Once the trim is finished, use a wide roller to cover the middle section of the wall. Wait 2-3 hours for the paint to dry before applying another coat.
17508.pred: To paint a wall, first, you need to prepare the wall by cleaning it and applying a primer. Then, you can use a paint roller to apply the paint to the wall. Make sure to cover the entire wall evenly and let it dry before applying a second coat. You can also use a paintbrush to paint the edges and corners of the wall. Finally, let the paint dry completely before using the wall.

17509.question: How To Paint the Interior of a House
17509.gt: After you’ve bought your materials, prepare by removing all the furniture from the room. Next you can wash the walls and fill in any holes with spackle. Make sure to lay drop cloths or old sheets on the ground to protect the floor from paint. When you’re ready to paint, start with a layer of primer to cover all the walls. Once that has dried, you can paint with color. Use small brushes to paint edges and large rollers to cover the rest.
17509.pred: To paint the interior of a house, first, cover the electrical outlets, switch plates, wood handrails, and light fixtures with green tape. Then, wash the walls, ceiling, and moldings with T.S.P. before painting. After that, paint the walls, ceiling, and moldings with a paint roller. Finally, remove the green tape from the electrical outlets, switch plates, wood handrails, and light fixtures.

17524.question: How To Paint a Bathroom
17524.gt: To paint a bathroom, use a mildew-resistant, satin or semi-gloss paint since they're durable and water resistant. To get started, clean the bathroom walls and cover anything that you don't want to paint with plastic or drop cloths. Then, paint the ceiling and trim first, using a roller for most of the ceiling and a paint brush for the edges and trim. Next, apply a paint primer to the walls if you're making a drastic color change or patching any holes. Finally, use a roller and paint brush to apply 2 coats of paint to the walls, letting them dry after each coat.
17524.pred: To paint a bathroom, first, you need to prepare the area by removing any fixtures or objects that may get in the way. Then, use a paint roller to apply a coat of paint to the walls, starting from the bottom and working your way up. Make sure to cover all areas evenly and let the paint dry completely before applying a second coat. Finally, clean up any excess paint and let the walls dry completely before putting the fixtures back in place.

17563.question: How To Paint Laminate Cabinets
17563.gt: To paint laminate cabinets, start by removing the hardware, cleaning the surface, and sanding the cabinets with medium-grit sandpaper until the surface feels smooth. Next, roll on a coat of bonding primer and let it dry completely. Then, roll on 2-3 coats of paint, letting each coat dry completely before adding a new one. You can use an angled paintbrush to paint the areas that your roller can't reach easily, such as the edges and borders. Finally, let the paint dry for 6-8 hours before applying a polycrylic sealant.
17563.pred: To paint laminate cabinets, you should first remove the doors and drawers, then sand the surfaces with a mouse sander to remove the shiny finish. Vacuum the area and wipe the surfaces with tack cloths. Spray the surfaces with an oil-based spray primer, wait for it to dry, and then sand the cabinets with 220-grit sandpaper. Buy high-quality interior paint and apply it with a small foam roller set for doors and large areas, and a paint brush for crevices and smaller areas. Allow the paint to dry, let it cure for 2 days to 2 weeks, and reattach the hardware and drawers.

17566.question: How To Paint Melamine
17566.gt: To paint melamine, you'll need primer designed specifically for melamine or laminate wood as well as some melamine paint. To get started, rough up the melamine with 150-grit sandpaper so the primer and paint sticks to it better. You can apply a liquid deglosser to the melamine for 15 minutes instead if you're in a rush. Next, apply 2 coats of primer, letting it dry after each coat. Finally, apply 2 coats of melamine paint using a paintbrush or spray canister and then let everything dry for 24 hours.
17566.pred: To paint melamine, you will need a paintbrush, a paint can, and a piece of melamine. First, apply a thin layer of paint to the melamine using the paintbrush. Then, let the paint dry for a few minutes. Next, apply a second coat of paint to the melamine, making sure to cover all areas evenly. Finally, let the paint dry completely before using the melamine.

17642.question: How To Prepare for a Night of Drinking
17642.gt: To prepare for a night of drinking, start by getting plenty of rest and eating a good, protein-rich meal beforehand, since you definitely don't want to drink on an empty stomach. Alcohol can impair decision-making abilities, so it's a good idea to agree on a plan for the night with your friends before going out. Then, choose a designated driver or arrange to use a taxi or public transportation to get around safely.
17642.pred: To prepare for a night of drinking, it is important to have a plan in place. This can include having a designated driver, setting a budget, and knowing your limits. It is also important to stay hydrated and avoid drinking on an empty stomach. Additionally, it is important to be aware of your surroundings and to drink responsibly.

17656.question: How To Get Acrylic Paint Out of Clothes
17656.gt: To get wet acrylic paint stains out of clothes, first run the stains under cold water to flush out as much of the paint as possible. Then, apply a commercial stain remover to the stains. Machine wash your garment using warm water, and the stains should be gone! For acrylic paint stains that are already dry, start by dabbing the stains with some rubbing alcohol and a cloth until you see some of the color transfer to the cloth. You can also use nail polish remover, hairspray, or another alcohol-based product. Finally, apply a stain remover, and machine wash your garment with warm water. Remember not to dry your clothing until the acrylic paint is completely gone since it could cause the stains to set. If your stain has already set, read on for ways to remove acrylic paint with hairspray, vinegar, or isopropyl alcohol!
17656.pred: To remove acrylic paint from clothes, first, apply a small amount of toothpaste to the stained area. Then, gently rub the toothpaste into the fabric using a toothbrush. Rinse the area with water and repeat the process if necessary.

17658.question: How To Get Paint Out of Jeans
17658.gt: To get paint out of jeans that's water-based, start by pouring warm water over the stain. Then, apply laundry detergent to the stain and rub it in with a damp cloth. If the paint doesn't come out, try dabbing it with rubbing alcohol and scrubbing it with a clean toothbrush until all the paint is gone. If you're dealing with oil-based paint, scrape the paint off with a blunt knife. If that doesn't help, cover the stain with glycerin, which will dissolve the paint. Let the glycerin sit on the jeans overnight before machine washing them.
17658.pred: To get paint out of jeans, you can use a paper towel and paint thinner. First, put the paint thinner on the paper towel and then dab it on the pants. The paint should melt off, and there should be no dye color on the paper towel. It takes seconds to do.

17795.question: How To Clean Soft Ballet Slippers
17795.gt: It’s important to clean your soft ballet slippers the right way to keep them looking nice. Clean leather or pointe shoes with warm water mixed with a little laundry detergent or dish soap and a soft cloth. Try not to use too much water, since this can crack the material and break down the glue. Once you’ve finished cleaning your slippers, wear them for half an hour or until they’re dry so they can mold to your feet. Canvas shoes are easier to clean. All you need to do is put them in a lingerie bag and wash them in the washing machine. Leave them to air dry away from direct sunlight. Don’t dry them in the dryer since this can shrink them.
17795.pred: To clean soft ballet slippers, first, remove the insole and wash it with soap and water. Then, use a soft brush to gently scrub the exterior of the slipper. For tough stains, apply a small amount of soap directly to the slipper and scrub with the brush. Rinse the slipper with water and let it air dry. Once dry, reinsert the insole and your soft ballet slippers are clean and ready to wear again.

18169.question: How To Cool Cakes
18169.gt: After you bake a cake, you should let it cool before you decorate and eat it. If you want to cool a cake in the refrigerator, let it sit on your counter for 5-10 minutes, then place the cake pan in the fridge for another 5-10 minutes. Take your cake pan back out of the fridge and seal the top of your cake pan by wrapping it at least twice with plastic wrap, then return the cake to the refrigerator for an additional 1-2 hours.
18169.pred: To cool cakes, you can place them on a cooling rack or a plate. The video shows a man placing a cake on a cooling rack to cool it down.

18174.question: How To Fix Cake Disasters
18174.gt: To fix a cake disaster where your cake turned out burnt or overdone, start by carefully cutting off the top or bottom of the cake if it's burned, as well as any burnt parts on the edges. Then, heat equal parts sugar and water on the stovetop to make a simple syrup, and add a flavoring, like vanilla extract. Next, brush the syrup mixture on the cake, which will help moisten it. Finally, decorate your cake with other moist ingredients to make it less dry, like buttercream, fruit, and chocolate.
18174.pred: The video provides a step-by-step guide on how to fix cake disasters. The man in the video demonstrates how to use a box to protect the cake and how to use a plastic bag to keep the cake fresh. He also shows how to use a wire to keep the cake in place and how to use a thermometer to check the temperature of the cake. The video provides a comprehensive guide on how to fix cake disasters and keep the cake fresh.

18181.question: How To Make Marble Cake
18181.gt: To make marble cake, pour a box of yellow or white cake mix into a bowl and beat it with the sugar, salt, eggs, vanilla, fats, milk, and water for 2 minutes, then stir in the flour. Next, put the cocoa, sour cream, and 1 cup of the batter in a separate bowl and mix it to make the chocolate batter. Then, spread the plain batter in a cake pan, spoon the chocolate batter on top, and use a skewer to swirl the batters in a figure-8 pattern. Finally, bake the cake for 30 minutes at 350°F.
18181.pred: To make marble cake, you will need a cake pan, a bowl of batter, a bowl of chocolate batter, and a spoon. First, pour the batter into the cake pan. Then, pour the chocolate batter into the center of the cake pan. Next, use a spoon to swirl the chocolate batter into the batter. Finally, bake the cake in the oven until it is fully cooked.

18786.question: How To Make Mannequin Heads
18786.gt: To make a mannequin head with paper mâché, start by blowing up a balloon to the size you want your head to be. Then, tear newspaper into several 2-inch by 6-inch strips, and dip them in a paste made of 2 parts water to 1 part flour. Smooth the strips over the balloon one at a time until it’s completely covered, and create details like a nose and mouth by wadding up newspaper, taping it to the head, and covering with more wet strips. Once it’s dried, smooth out edges with a light coat of spray adhesive.
18786.pred: To make mannequin heads, you will need a mannequin head, a roll of tape, and a marker. First, wrap the tape around the mannequin head, covering the entire surface. Then, use the marker to draw eyes, a nose, and a mouth on the tape. Finally, add any additional details or decorations to the mannequin head.

19726.question: How To Descale a Kettle
19726.gt: To descale a kettle, fill it with a mixture of 1 part white vinegar and 1 part water. Leave the vinegar mixture in the kettle for 1 hour. Then, dump it out and wipe down the inside of the kettle with a clean rag. Once all the lime-scale is gone, rinse your kettle out with water 5 times, and voila.
19726.pred: To descale a kettle, first, fill the kettle with water and add vinegar. Then, turn on the kettle and let it heat up. After the water boils, turn off the kettle and let it sit for a few minutes. Finally, pour out the water and vinegar mixture and rinse the kettle with clean water.

19765.question: How To Clean a Waffle Iron
19765.gt: To clean a waffle iron, start by wiping down the inside of it with a dry paper towel to remove any leftover grease or oil. Then, use a soft-bristled brush or an old toothbrush to clear off any crumbs. If there's dried batter crusted on the waffle iron, hold a damp cloth over it to soften it so it's easier to wipe away. Once you've loosened the batter, use a rubber spatula to scrape it off. Finally, close the waffle iron. Wipe down the outside with a damp cloth.
19765.pred: To clean a waffle iron, first, pour water into the waffle iron and close the lid. Then, wait for the water to heat up and boil. After that, open the lid and use a cloth to wipe the inside of the waffle iron. Finally, close the lid and let the waffle iron cool down before using it again.

20118.question: How To Keep Cheesecake from Cracking
20118.gt: Cheesecake develops cracks when the batter has too many air bubbles or when it shrinks after baking. To prevent these cracks, mix the batter lightly and don’t overmix since mixing too much will cause air bubbles to form. You can also try adding a tablespoon of cornstarch or flour to the batter since this will prevent it from shrinking after baking. Before you add the batter to the pan, make sure to grease the pan thoroughly with a cooking spray, butter, or shortening. This will prevent the cheesecake from pulling away from the pan and cracking as it cools. When you take the pan out of the oven, place it in a warm bath of water in a bigger pan. That way, it will cool down more slowly and be less likely to crack.
20118.pred: To keep cheesecake from cracking, it is important to ensure that the cheesecake is fully cooked before removing it from the oven. This can be done by checking the cheesecake with a toothpick or knife to see if it comes out clean. If the cheesecake is not fully cooked, it may crack when it is removed from the oven. Additionally, it is important to let the cheesecake cool in the oven for a few minutes before removing it from the oven. This allows the cheesecake to set and helps prevent cracking.

20617.question: How To Decorate a Box
20617.gt: To decorate a box, start by covering it with something you already have around the house, like contact paper or leftover fabric. Then, add stickers, sequins, or glitter for a little shimmer and shine. Alternatively, try your hand at decoupage by layering your box with pages of your favorite book, sheet music, or wrapping paper. Then, apply a coat of varnish or lacquer to give it a finished look.
20617.pred: To decorate a box, first, cut a piece of paper to the size of the box. Then, use a glue stick to apply glue to the box and place the paper on top. Next, use scissors to cut the paper to fit the box. Finally, use a glue stick to apply glue to the paper and place it on the box.

20868.question: How To Make Muddy Buddies
20868.gt: To make muddy buddies, start by microwaving chocolate chips, peanut butter, and butter for 1 minute. Stir the mixture, then microwave for 30 seconds. Continue stirring and microwaving for 30 seconds at a time, until the mixture is smooth with no lumps. Then, add vanilla and stir the mixture into 9 cups of cereal. Put the cereal in a 2 gallon resealable bag with powdered sugar, and shake the bag to coat the cereal with the sugar. Finally, spread the mixture on a parchment lined baking sheet, and let it cool for 10 to 15 minutes before serving.
20868.pred: To make muddy buddies, you will need to mix flour and water in a bowl. Then, knead the dough until it becomes smooth and elastic. After that, you can shape the dough into small balls and add any desired fillings. Finally, you can bake the muddy buddies in the oven until they are golden brown.

20880.question: How To Make Tuna Salad
20880.gt: To make a classic, easy tuna salad, stir a 12-oz can of white tuna, 1/2 cup of chopped celery, 1/2 cup of sliced green onions, and 3 tbsp of chopped sweet pickles in a bowl. Then, make the dressing by combining 1/3 cup of mayonnaise, 1 tablespoon of lemon juice, and 2 teaspoons of fresh dill. When both mixtures are made, stir the tuna and dressing together in a bowl. Cover the bowl and chill the tuna salad for an hour, then serve!
20880.pred: To make tuna salad, you will need to chop up vegetables and place them in a blender. Then, add tuna to the blender and blend the ingredients together. Once blended, transfer the tuna salad to a plate and garnish with fresh herbs.

20889.question: How To Make Crab Salad
20889.gt: To make crab salad, start by heating butter in a pan, and frying chopped onions and bell peppers for 3 minutes. Next, add flaked crab meat and cook for 3 minutes. Then, in a medium mixing bowl, combine mayonnaise, sour cream, lemon juice, mustard, and parsley. Once the crab meat and vegetables are ready, stir the mixture into the dressing until it's fully coated. Finally, season the salad with salt and pepper, and serve it warm or cold.
20889.pred: To make crab salad, you will need to start by breaking the crab into smaller pieces. Then, add mayonnaise, lemon juice, dill weed, salt, and pepper to the bowl. Mix the ingredients well and chill the salad for an hour. Finally, serve the salad on a plate with crackers and tomatoes.

21786.question: How To Clean Ivory
21786.gt: To clean ivory, dust the surface off thoroughly with a paintbrush to remove minor dirt or impurities. You can also grate a white vinyl eraser and rub the shavings against the ivory to remove the dirt. If you're dealing with more significant soiling, mix a few tablespoons of water with a squirt of mild soap and use a cotton ball or Q-Tip to apply the solution, working on small sections at a time. Finish by drying the ivory with a clean, non-abrasive white cloth.

Finally, rinse the ivory with water and dry it with a soft cloth.

21798.question: How To Clean Mineral Deposits
21798.gt: To clean mineral deposits in your bathroom, empty the toilet bowl, fill it with a gallon of white vinegar, and let it sit overnight before scrubbing the loosened deposits away with a toilet brush. You can also immerse your showerhead in vinegar and use a mixture of vinegar and warm water to wipe away mineral deposits from your tub and shower curtains.

21803.question: How To Clean Old Photos
21803.gt: To clean old photos, start by laying the photograph on top of a towel on a clean, flat surface. Next, use a can of compressed air to blow away any dirt or dust from the photogragh. If the photo is particularly delicate, you can use a soft cleaning brush instead. After you’ve removed the surface debris, use an emulsion cleaning cloth specifically made for photos to gently wipe the surface. Then, dry the photo with a hairdryer set on high heat, holding it 10 inches away from the picture to avoid heat damage.

21821.question: How To Clean Rubber Floor Mats

For stubborn stains, scrub them using a rag or brush soaked in soapy water before rinsing off any suds. Finally, hang the mats up to air dry so they don't develop any mold.

21851.question: How To Clean Your Air Filter
21851.gt: To clean your dry air filter, start by removing the filter from its housing and taking it out of the car. Then, vacuum the filter using the hose attachment to remove residue and dirt. Finally, wipe the filter with a dry cloth before returning it to the car. If you have an oil filter, spray it with mild soap and water after you've removed it from the car. When the cleaner has soaked in, put the filter under running water and rinse it clean. Allow the filter to air dry overnight, then re-oil it and return it to the car.

You can also clean tiles, tubs, and sinks using hydrogen peroxide, white vinegar, and liquid soap.

22267.question: How To Make Banana Peel Tea
22267.gt: To make banana peel tea, remove the peels from 4 fresh, organic bananas and place them on a baking sheet. Next, bake the banana peels for about 1 hour at 150ºF until they get dry, which will pasteurize them. Then, pulverize the peels, one at a time, in your blender. Add 1 heaping teaspoon of the pulverized peel to your mug and pour hot water over it. Finally, strain the mixture through a fine-mesh coffee strainer before enjoying the tea.

22360.question: How To Lay Concrete Blocks
22360.gt: To lay concrete blocks, begin by building a frame with 2x4s and pouring concrete into it to prepare a footing. Next, prepare cement mortar by mixing water and dried mortar in a 5 gallon bucket. Then, spread the mortar on the footing and begin stacking the blocks, beginning in a corner. Continue stacking the blocks with mortar in between and check to make sure the wall is level with each new layer.
22360.pred: To lay concrete blocks, you will need a trowel, a level, and a bucket of cement. First, apply a layer of cement to the ground using the trowel. Then, place the first block on the cement and use the level to ensure it is even. Next, apply more cement to the top of the block and place the next block on top. Repeat this process until you have laid all the blocks. Finally, use the trowel to smooth out the cement between the blocks.

22543.question: How To Make a Petticoat
22543.gt: To make a petticoat, start by purchasing 4 to 5 yards of tulle or crinoline. Next, measure from the waist seam to the bottom hem of the skirt you plan on wearing over the petticoat, and subtract 1 inch. Then, divide this number by 3 and add 1 inch for the seams to get the width for each of the 3 tiers of the petticoat. Once you have all of your measurements, cut the strips of fabric accordingly, and assemble your tiers with a straight stitch and a ½ inch seam allowance. Finally, after the tiers are done, sew them together.

22544.question: How To Make Pajama Pants
22544.gt: To make pajama pants, start by folding a pair of pajama pants you already own in half so that the side seams match up and the crotch is visible. Next, fold your new fabric in half, place the folded pajama pants on top, and trace around them to create a basic pattern. Then, cut the fabric out along the traced line and use it as a template to trace and cut out the second leg. Finally, sew the legs together, add an elastic waistband, and finish the cuffs to complete your project.

22649.question: How To Make a Cheese Omelette
22649.gt: To make a cheese omelette, first crack 2 eggs into a mixing bowl. Then, add 2 tablespoons (30 mL) of water and a dash of salt and pepper. Adding water to the egg will make your omelette light and fluffy. Whisk everything together until the mixture is thoroughly combined. Next, heat 1 tablespoon (14 g) of butter in a pan over medium heat until it melts and coats the bottom of the pan. Then, pour in the egg mixture. After about 10 seconds, use a spatula to gently guide the egg into the middle and away from the sides. Keep doing this until the egg firms up. Now, sprinkle ⅓ cup (42 g) of grated cheese on one half of the cooked egg, and fold the other half over the cheese using the spatula. Finally, cook the omelette for 30 more seconds, or until the egg is completely cooked through, and enjoy!
22649.pred: To make a cheese omelette, you will need to whisk two eggs in a bowl, add salt and pepper, and then pour the mixture into a heated pan. Once the eggs start to cook, add shredded cheese to one side of the omelette and fold the other side over the cheese. Cook until the cheese is melted and the omelette is cooked through.

22655.question: How To Make a Fluffy 3 Egg Omelette
22655.gt: To make a fluffy 3 egg omelette, preheat your pan over medium heat, and crack 3 eggs into a bowl. Add 1 tablespoon of milk, a pinch of salt, and any vegetables you want to the eggs, and whisk them with a fork until there are plenty of bubbles. Then, coat the pan with a thin layer of olive oil and pour in the egg mixture. As the mixture sizzles, use a spatula to lift the edges of the omelette so they don't stick to the pan. After about 1-2 minutes of cooking, sprinkle grated cheese on top of the egg and fold it in half, letting the cheese melt for another 15 seconds before serving!

Once the butter has melted, pour the egg mixture into the pan and let it cook for a few seconds. Then, add your fillings, such as ham, cheese, or vegetables, to one side of the omelette. Use a spatula to fold the other side of the omelette over the fillings. Cook for another minute or until the cheese is melted and the eggs are fully cooked. Slide the omelette onto a plate and serve hot.

24319.question: How To Make Apple Crumble
24319.gt: To make an apple crumble, first, preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Then, peel and core 5-6 apples. Cut the apples into 1/4 inch (0.6 cm) pieces and spread them out in an 8 inch (20 cm) baking dish. Next, combine 2/3 cups (80 grams) of flour, 2 tablespoons of granulated sugar, 1/2 cup (100 grams) of brown sugar, and 1/2 tsp of cinnamon in a large mixing bowl. Cut 6 tablespoons of chilled unsalted butter into the mixture with a fork or a pastry cutter. Cutting in simply means combining the butter with the flour until it reaches a crumbly sandy texture. Be careful not to overwork the butter or it will become too soft and more difficult to work with. Pour the crumble topping over the apples and bake it for 45 minutes or until golden. Serve and enjoy!
24319.pred: To make apple crumble, you will need to mix brown sugar, cinnamon, and butter in a bowl. Then, add flour and mix it well. After that, spread the mixture on top of the apples in a baking dish and bake it in the oven.

25189.question: How To Make Chocolate Fondue
25189.gt: To make chocolate fondue, start by breaking up 1 pound of chocolate into small pieces with your fingers or a knife. Then, bring 2-4 inches of water to a boil in a pot over medium-high heat and place a mixing bowl on top of the pot so it traps the steam. Next, pour 2 cups of heavy cream in the pot and heat it up for 1-2 minutes, lowering the heat if it starts to boil. Finally, add the chocolate to the bowl and whisk everything together until the chocolate is melted. To round out the flavor of your fondue, add 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract.

25190.question: How To Make Fondue
25190.gt: To make basic cheese fondue, choose 1 pound of cheese that's suitable for fondue, like Swiss, Fontina, Gruyere, or cheddar, and shred it with a cheese grater. Next, mix 1 cup of white wine with 1-2 teaspoons of flour over low heat on the stove top, stirring until it looks smooth. Then, combine the cheese and wine mixture on the stove. Finally, transfer the cheese mixture to your fondue pot and light the pot to keep the cheese warm and melted.

25363.question: How To Use a Guitar Whammy Bar
25363.gt: If you want to create a unique sound with your electric guitar, try attaching a whammy bar to it. First, make sure that your guitar can mount a whammy bar. You should see a small hole near the bridge of your guitar where the whammy bar will go. Since whammy bars come in different sizes, you may want to take your guitar to a music shop to make sure you get the right one. When you’re ready to use your whammy bar, plug your guitar into an amp, play a note, and gently push the bar down to drop the pitch of the sound. Practice playing chords and riffs with the whammy bar added. You can also pull up on the whammy to raise the pitch.

25564.question: How To Clean Up Dog Waste from a Backyard
25564.gt: To remove dog waste from your backyard, try gathering it up every day in a plastic bag. Place your hand inside the bag like a glove, put the bag over the poo, and pull the bag down over it so you don't have to touch it directly. Alternatively, you can use a pooper scooper, which you can buy online or from a pet store. This is a shovel-like device that picks up the poo for you so you can dispose of it. Another option is to apply freeze spray to the poo, which will make it easier to remove later. To use the spray, hold the can a few inches from the poo, spray it for 2 or 3 seconds, and wait for it to harden. Whichever method you decide to use, make sure you dispose of the poo in a trash can, since dog waste can be harmful to humans if it's left lying around.

25727.question: How To Make Pruno
25727.gt: To make pruno, start by putting some orange wedges and fruit cocktail in a bag, sealing it, and then mashing everything together with your fingers. Next, pour water into the bag and then place it in a sink or bowl filled with hot water, adding new hot water every 5 minutes for 15 minutes. After 15 minutes, wrap the bag in a towel and set it aside somewhere dark for 48 hours. Then, add sugar and ketchup to the bag and let it dissolve for 15 minutes before heating it in hot water again. Finally, wrap the bag and hide it for 24 hours, repeating the heating process every day for 3 days.

Finally, bake the dough in the oven for 20 minutes at 430 degrees Fahrenheit.

25733.question: How To Make Watermelon Wine
25733.gt: To make watermelon wine, heat chunks of watermelon over a medium heat for 30 minutes so they break down into juice. Then, strain 14 cups of juice to get rid of any seeds before adding the juice to a pot with sugar. Heat the pot until it's almost boiling, then add acid blend and yeast nutrient. Next, transfer the juice to a fermentation container and wait 24 hours before adding champagne yeast. After another day, rack the wine, then leave it for 3 months. Finally, rack the wine again, leave it for 2 months, rack it for a third time, and leave it  for another month.

25849.question: How To Use Stevia
25849.gt: To use stevia, use a few drops of it as a substitute for 1-2 teaspoons of white sugar. You can add the drops to drinks, sauces, salad dressings, and soups. 25935.question: How To Make Rum

Let that mixture ferment for a couple days before you chill it to knock the yeast to the bottom of the bucket. Then, distill the rum by running a siphon from the mash to a collection tank. As the rum evaporates, it will condense in the siphon and flow into the other container.

26654.question: How To Make Chocolate Martinis
26654.gt: To make a classic chocolate martini, first prepare the garnish by placing chocolate liqueur and cocoa powder in separate dishes. Next, dunk the rim of a martini glass into the liqueur and then the cocoa powder to coat the rim. Then, add ice, liqueur, vodka, and half and half to a cocktail shaker and shake for 20 seconds until the ingredients are thoroughly combined. Finally, pour the martini into the rimmed glass and serve while chilled.

27166.question: How To Give a Rectal Exam
27166.gt: To give a rectal exam, first lubricate your gloved finger with warm petroleum jelly to keep the anal canal relaxed. Then, with your patient on their side, assess their anus for abnormalities, such as hemorrhoids, warts, rashes, or fissures. When you’ve checked their anus, ask your patient to take a deep breath to relax them and prevent their sphincter contracting. 27322.question: How To Infuse Vodka With Watermelon
27322.gt: To infuse vodka with watermelon, start by cutting a watermelon up into small, 1-inch cubes. Then, place the cubes in a jar and fill the jar with vodka so the cubes are completely submerged. Next, seal the jar and store it in a cool, dark place for at least 6 days. Finally, place a cheesecloth or tea towel over the mouth of the jar and strain the watermelon-infused vodka into a new container.

27328.question: How To Make Alcohol from Common Table Sugar
27328.gt: To make alcohol from common table sugar, start by getting a food-grade plastic container or a glass carboy to use as a fermentation vessel for your alcohol. Then, dissolve 15-20 pounds of sugar in a pot of warm water before pouring it into your fermentation vessel. Next, add a packet of yeast and let the mixture sit, uncovered, for 24 hours. After 24 hours, put the lid on the vessel, attach a water-filled airlock to the lid, and let the mixture ferment for 2-10 days. Finally, purify the fermented alcohol before siphoning it off.

27717.question: How To Make Hungarian Goulash
27717.gt: To make Hungarian goulash, saute a chopped onion in vegetable oil over medium heat until it turns golden. Remove the pan from the heat, then stir in paprika, cubed beef, a pinch of salt, and water to the pan and put it back on the heat. Cook the ingredients for 6-8 minutes, then add all of the remaining ingredients except the potatoes and simmer until the meat is nearly cooked. Add the potatoes and turn down the heat, simmering for another 20 minutes or until the potatoes are tender.

27762.question: How To Make Resin Jewelry
27762.gt: To make resin jewelry, start by combining equal amounts of polyurethane casting resin and a resin catalyst. Then, pour enough of the mixture into a jewelry mold to cover the bottom of the mold. Next, turn on a hair dryer and hold it 4 inches above the resin to remove any air bubbles. Let the resin harden for 15 minutes, then add your embellishments, such as flowers or feathers, and pour another layer of resin over the embellishment. Afterwards, use the hair dryer again to remove any bubbles, then cover the mold and let the resin cure overnight.

27766.question: How To Make Sterling Silver Jewelry
27766.gt: The easiest way for a beginner to make sterling silver jewelry is to mold sterling silver clay into the desired shape. Next, either allow it to dry overnight or use a hairdryer, then use tweezers to place the dry silver clay onto a piece of stainless steel mesh over a stove burner. Use a low flame until the clay burns off, then raise the heat until the remaining silver glows red. After 10 minutes, turn off the heat and let your silver cool.

28080.question: How To Install Carpet on Concrete (Basement)
28080.gt: To install carpet on concrete, choose a carpet that is constructed of synthetic products only as natural fibers are often too absorbent. Before you install the carpet, make sure to check the concrete for any moisture issues that need to be addressed. Then, lay tack strips around the perimeter of the room and install your strips of padding. After that, lay your carpet, starting at the center of the room and tightening the carpet with a rented knee kicker as you move toward the walls. Finally, finish with your edges.

28351.question: How To Remove a Coffee Stain from Carpet
28351.gt: To remove a coffee stain from your carpet, start by mixing a solution of 2 cups of warm water and 1/4 cup of lemon juice. Alternatively, you can combine 1 tablespoon of dish soap, 1 tablespoon of white vinegar, and 2 cups of warm water. Apply your homemade cleaner, and soak up the excess coffee with paper towels. Next, dip a cleaning towel into the solution and press it onto the stained area of carpet. Finally, spray the stained area with water to remove any leftover cleaning solution.

28358.question: How To Get Adhesive out of Carpet
28358.gt: To get adhesive out of carpet, such as household glue, remove as much of the glue as possible from the carpet by blotting with a damp towel or using a spoon or knife to scrape up the adhesive if it has dried. Then, pour distilled white vinegar onto a towel and wipe the area thoroughly for at least 1 minute. Let the vinegar soak into the carpet for 15 minutes before wiping the area with a wet cloth to remove the adhesive. You may need to peel some flakes of glue off of the carpet as you’re wiping to clean it completely.

28364.question: How To Get Tar out of Carpet
28364.gt: If you’re trying to get tar out of carpet, start by blotting it with a paper towel. Then hold an ice cube against the stain for a minute. When the tar feels hard, use a butter knife or a spoon to scrape up as much as you can. To remove what’s left, you can try wetting a cloth with water and dry cleaning solvent and gently dabbing the stain. If that doesn’t work, try mixing a little dishwashing detergent with some water and blotting the stain. Got a really stubborn stain? You may need to try a commercial product, like WD-40.

28436.question: How To Tape and Mud Drywall
28436.gt: To tape and mud drywall, use a drywall knife to spread a liberal amount of drywall mud into the seam between 2 drywall boards, then run the trowel over the freshly-mudded sections. Before the mud dries, press a strip of paper tape into the freshly mudded joint, starting at one corner and working your way to another. Seal the tape with your trowel, let it dry overnight, then sand the first coat. Repeat this process with a thicker layer of mud for 2 additional coats.

29733.question: How To Fix Brakes on a Bike
29733.gt: If your bike’s brake pads are worn to less than ¼ of an inch, you’ll have to replace the pads. To do so, remove the nuts and washers from your old pads and pull the pads free from the calipers, which squeeze the pads to the tires to make the bike stop. Then, put the new pads in, align them with the tires, and replace the nuts and washers. If you need to adjust your brake’s calipers, tighten the spring on the side that’s moving too much by bending it with pliers. For brake cables that are really stiff or hard to work, remove them completely and lubricate them.
29733.pred: To fix brakes on a bike, you need to first loosen the bolts on the brake caliper using a screwdriver. Then, remove the brake pads and clean the caliper with a cloth. After that, reattach the brake pads and tighten the bolts. Finally, test the brakes to ensure they are working properly.

30229.question: How To Cook Barley
30229.gt: If you want to cook barley, combine 2 to 3 cups of water with 1 cup of barley. After you've brought the water to a boil, let the pan simmer for 30 minutes. Then, leave the barley to sit for 15 minutes so it can absorb excess water. If you want to bake barley instead, preheat your oven to 375 °F and boil 2 cups of water in a saucepan. Pour the barley into a baking dish and add the boiling water, then mix in 1 tablespoon of butter and 1/2 teaspoon of salt. Bake for 60 minutes.
30229.pred: To cook barley, you need to boil it in water. First, fill a pot with water and bring it to a boil. Then, add the barley to the pot and let it cook for about 20 minutes. After that, drain the water and serve the cooked barley.

31157.question: How To Shift a Semi Truck
31157.gt: To shift gears in a semi truck, start by pushing down on the clutch pedal and moving the shifter into the Lo-gear position. 36485.question: How To Remove Tree Stumps
36485.gt: To remove a tree stump, first use a shovel to dig up the soil around the tree so the roots are exposed. Then, cut the smaller roots up into pieces with loppers, and use a pruning or reciprocating saw to cut up the bigger roots. For a faster method, you can rent a stump grinder from a home improvement store. To get rid of a tree stump using stump removal chemicals, first cut it as close to the ground as possible. Then, drill several holes into the top of the stump that are at least 10 inches (25 centimeters) deep. Fill the holes with a stump removal chemical, then wait 4 to 6 weeks for the stump to rot. Finally, break up the rotted stump with an axe and remove it from the ground.

43600.question: How To Cure Cast Iron
43600.gt:
To cure cast iron, warm the cookware slightly over the stove. Then, use a 
cloth to apply a thin layer of olive oil, shortening, or lard all over the 
cookware, including the exterior. Use a clean cloth to wipe away the 
excess oil. Place a lid on the pan and put it over low heat. Wait 5-15 
minutes to check for haze under the lid, increasing the temperature until you see 
it. Remove the pan from the heat to cool. Apply another coat of oil, and 
place it on the heat for an hour. Repeat this curing process 2 times before 
scrubbing the cast iron with table salt and rinsing.
43600.pred: To cure cast iron, you need to season it with oil. First, preheat your oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit. Then, place the cast iron skillet upside down on the middle rack of the oven. This process will help create a non-stick surface on the skillet.

44120.question: How To Flip a Coin

Whoever called the side that’s facing up is the winner of the toss.

44336.question: How To Make Puff Pastry

Gently knead the dough, fold it in thirds, roll it, turn it, and repeat to create thin layers. Rewrap the dough and refrigerate for an hour. Once the dough is chilled, use it for croissants or filled pastries!

46885.question: How To Knit a Cable
46885.gt: To knit a cable, start by casting 18 stitches on your left needle. Then, alternate between purling 6 stitches and knitting 6 stitches for the next 4 rows. Next, start your fifth row by purling 6 stitches, and then transfer the first 3 knit stitches from your regular needle to a cable needle. Once you've done that, move the cable needle to the front or back of your work, and knit the next 3 stitches on your knitting needle followed by 3 more on the cable needle. Finally, purl the last 6 and turn your work.

47393.question: How To Unblock a Drain
47393.gt: To unblock a drain, start by drying the sink with a towel and pouring 1 cup of baking soda into the drain. Then, pour 2 cups of boiling water into the drain to help the baking soda reach the clog. After a few minutes, add 1 more cup of baking soda, followed by 1 cup of white vinegar. Once the gurgling sounds in the drain stop, pour 4 more cups of boiling water down the drain to clear it.

If you can’t see the clog, use an Allen wrench to turn the operator's blades, which can help break up debris. You can also use a plunger to pull up any remaining clogs. Then, run some water through the drain, turn the power back on, and try to run the disposal.

47461.question: How To Water Indoor Plants

47468.question: How To Care for a Norfolk Pine
47468.gt: To care for a Norfolk pine, plant it in equal parts potting soil, peat moss, and sand. Keep the soil slightly moist, and make sure the tree gets lots of indirect sunlight. Since Norfolk pines will turn to face the light, turn your tree regularly so it grows straight despite its tendency to lean toward the sun. These trees also thrive in moderate temperatures ranging from 55 degrees Fahrenheit to 65 degrees Fahrenheit, so either set your thermostat accordingly!

47469.question: How To Care for a Prayer Plant
47469.gt: To care for a prayer plant, keep it in a room with a temperature between 65 and 75 degrees Fahrenheit, since this will prevent it from drying out or wilting. Although you should never keep it in direct sunlight, make sure you place or hang your prayer plant near a window so it gets indirect sunlight. You should also add lukewarm water to the pot whenever its soil starts to get dry so it won’t dry out. In addition to water, feed your prayer plant with a water-soluble fertilizer diluted to half-strength every 2 weeks, which will give it all the nutrients it needs. If you want your plant to grow quicker, use sharp scissors or hand pruners to snip a few inches from some of the stems 2 or 3 times a year, since new stems and leaves will grow from the cuts.
47469.pred: To care for a prayer plant, it is important to provide it with adequate sunlight, as seen in the video where the plant is placed near a window. The plant should be watered regularly, but not overwatered, as indicated by the presence of a watering can in the video. Additionally, the plant should be kept in a well-ventilated area, as shown by the presence of a fan in the video. Finally, the plant should be pruned regularly to maintain its shape and promote healthy growth.

47470.question: How To Care for a Sansevieria or Snake Plant
47470.gt: To care for a sansevieria or snake plant, place it in a windowsill that faces east, west or north so it gets the right amount of sunlight. You should also put up sheer drapes on the window in front of your plant to filter out intense afternoon sun. To keep the light exposure even, rotate your plant by a quarter turn each week. Before watering your snake plant, wait until the soil feels dry, and sprinkle the water along the edge of the pot, rather than dumping it all in center. If you can, use distilled water so the minerals in tap water don't harm your plant.
47470.pred: To care for a sansevieria or snake plant, you should provide it with indirect bright light, water it less frequently, and maintain a temperature above 10 degrees Celsius. Additionally, you can propagate the plant by dividing the rhizome, using leaf cuttings, or seeds.

47485.question: How To Clean Your Indoor Houseplants
47485.gt: Cleaning your indoor house plants will help them stay healthy and keep pests at bay. Regularly spritz the leaves of your plants with lukewarm water to prevent a build-up of dust, which can attract insects. If the leaves are large, you can even use a damp cloth to wipe them down. You can also use a soft-bristled toothbrush to gently scrub dust off leaves if it has already built up over time. If the leaves on your plant are very small, swish them around in a bucket of lukewarm water to clean them quickly. Just make sure to support the soil in the pot with your hands so it doesn’t fall out when you turn the plant upside down. Once a year, put your plants in the shower and spray them all over with lukewarm water to remove any grime that’s been building up. Leave them to drip dry before returning them to their normal place.
47485.pred: To clean your indoor houseplants, you can use a damp cloth to wipe down the leaves and remove any dust or debris. It's important to avoid using harsh chemicals or soaps, as they can damage the plant. Additionally, you can use a soft-bristled brush to gently remove any dead or damaged leaves. It's also a good idea to regularly check for pests and treat them promptly if necessary.

47494.question: How To Get Rid of Mold on Houseplants
47494.gt: To get rid of mold on houseplants, start by taking your plant outside and wiping down the leaves with a dampened paper towel. If the mold is still visible after wiping down the leaves, cut those leaves off at the stem and dispose of them. Spray the plant thoroughly with fungicide before bringing it back inside your  home. Choose a bright area with good air circulation to prevent future mold from growing on your houseplant!
47494.pred: To get rid of mold on houseplants, you can use a mixture of water and vinegar. First, mix equal parts of water and vinegar in a spray bottle. Then, spray the solution onto the affected areas of the plant. Make sure to cover all the leaves and stems that are affected by the mold. Let the solution sit on the plant for a few minutes before rinsing it off with water. Repeat this process until the mold is completely gone. It's important to note that this solution is safe for most houseplants, but it's always a good idea to test it on a small area first to make sure it doesn't cause any damage.

47568.question: How To Harvest Rosemary
47568.gt: To harvest rosemary, wait until spring or summer since that's when rosemary grows most actively. You can trim off some of the plant every day or once a week, which will encourage new sprigs to grow. Also, when you're harvesting rosemary, only take sprigs that are at least 8 inches long so you're not harvesting from newly growing branches. Once you've found a sprig you want to harvest, use shears or scissors to cut off the top 2 inches. Just make sure you're not harvesting more than a quarter of the plant at a time.

48124.question: How To Make Chocolate Sauce

Then, combine your chocolate and heavy cream and gently mix the ingredients together as they melt. After the sauce melts, you can use it immediately or store it in the refrigerator for 2 weeks.

48138.question: How To Make Modeling Chocolate
48138.gt: To prepare modeling chocolate on the stove, first cut up your chocolate into small pieces. Next, spread the chocolate evenly in the top bowl of a double boiler. Once you’ve done that, simmer a little water in the lower part of the boiler over low heat. When the water is simmering, place the bowl of chocolate in the boiler and stir the chocolate with a spatula until it is completely melted. Then, set the bowl of chocolate aside and mix in some slightly warm corn syrup. Finish by letting the mixture cool for a few hours, then knead the chocolate until it’s smooth and malleable.

48141.question: How To Melt Almond Bark
48141.gt: To melt almond bark in a double boiler, chop it into small pieces that are roughly the same size so the chocolate will melt evenly. Fill the bottom of the double with water and place the almond bark in the top part of the double boiler. Turn your stove to medium-high heat, stirring the almond bark constantly until it melts. When all of the chunks are melted, turn the heat off and remove the top pan from the double-boiler.

48357.question: How To Clean a Cowhide Rug
48357.gt: To clean a cowhide rug, never use water since getting a cowhide rug wet can damage it. Instead, vacuum the rug regularly and shake it off outside every once in a while to get rid of dirt and dust that's trapped deep in the fibers. If you accidentally stain the rug, rub a small amount of shampoo into the stain using a damp, but not soaked, sponge. When you're finished, take a damp cloth and wipe away any soapy residue.

48450.question: How To Install Formica
48450.gt: To install Formica, start by marking the measurements on the Formica sheet, adding 1 inch to each measurement to avoid cutting it too small. Then, cover the lines with masking tape to make them easier to see, and cut along them with a saw. Next, spread contact cement on the edges of the Formica sheet and press on the edge strips with a dry roller. Once the sheet is ready, use a paintbrush to spread contact cement on the surface you’re covering, and to the back of the Formica sheet. Finally, lay the sheet on the surface and push it down firmly with a roller.

49270.question: How To Remove a Mustard Stain
49270.gt: If you’re trying to remove a mustard stain from clothing, first blot the stain if it’s fresh or scrape off what you can if it’s dried. Then, rinse the stain with cold, running water, rub it with detergent or stain remover, and run it through the wash. If you’ve gotten a mustard stain on furniture, start by scraping off any excess mustard. Then, mix some detergent with water and let it sit on the stain for 5-10 minutes before blotting.

49286.question: How To Remove Grass Stains from Clothing
49286.gt: To remove grass stains from clothing, try using white vinegar. First, remove any excess dirt or grass by blotting the area with a damp rag. Avoid rubbing, as this will cause the stain to penetrate deeper into your clothes. Once the dirt is removed, soak the stain in a mixture of equal parts warm water and white vinegar. After the stain has sat in the vinegar mixture for 5 minutes, apply laundry detergent to the area and gently massage the fabric for several minutes. From there, rinse the stain with cold water and repeat the process until it fades away.
49286.pred: To remove grass stains from clothing, first, apply a liquid to the stain using a spray bottle. Then, rub the stain with a cloth to remove it. Finally, wash the clothing in the washing machine.

49291.question: How To Remove Perfume Stains from Fabric
49291.gt: You can remove perfume stains from cotton or other washable fabrics with simple household ingredients. Try dabbing the stain with a damp sponge or cloth. For tougher stains, try soaking a paper towel in rubbing alcohol or a mixture of glycerin, detergent, and water. Then, cover the stain with the paper towel and leave it for 10 minutes. If that doesn’t work, soak the material in equal parts water and baking soda for 15 minutes, then wash it in your washing machine. To get perfume stains out of leather or suede, wipe it with warm, soapy water. If the stain’s still there, sprinkle cornmeal on top, leave it to sit for half an hour, then brush it off.

49301.question: How To Remove Tar and Asphalt from Clothing
49301.gt: If a piece of tar is stuck to your clothing, try filling a bag with ice cubes and rubbing it over the tar. Allow the tar to freeze and become brittle, then scrape it off with your fingernails or a dull knife. To get rid of smaller spots, try coating the affected area with vaseline or warm lard. Alternatively, take your piece of clothing outdoors, and dab a small amount of white kerosine or paint thinner on the spot. Finally, to remove the grease or oil, rub the area with a paper towel or rag.

53490.gt: To use a mandoline, unfold the mandoline's legs, place them on a cutting board, and face the mandoline perpendicular to you. Next, cut the fruit or veggie in half to create a flat surface. Then, place the food in the hand guard so the flat side faces the runway and slot the hand guard over the mandoline. Finally, hold the mandoline steady with your non-dominant hand and push the food down the runway to cut one slice. Repeat this motion with even pressure to make more slices of the same thickness.
53490.pred: To use a mandoline, first, open the box and take out the mandoline and its accessories. Next, place the mandoline on a cutting board and adjust the blade to the desired thickness. Then, place the vegetable or fruit on the mandoline and push it through the blade. Finally, collect the sliced pieces in a bowl or container.

54088.question: How To Cross Hatch
54088.gt: To learn basic cross hatching, draw a series of parallel lines. Next, add a perpendicular series of lines over the first set of lines. If you want to create lighter shading, draw fewer lines spread further apart. Alternatively, make the lines thicker and add more layers closer together for darker shading. You can also add layers of cross hatching in different directions to create a subtle, rich shading.
54088.pred: To cross hatch, first, you need to roll out the dough on a floured surface. Then, use a knife to make diagonal cuts on the dough. After that, flip the dough over and make another set of diagonal cuts. Finally, bake the dough in the oven.

54096.question: How To Make a Tortillon
54096.gt: To make a tortillon, start by measuring 1 inch down the side of a piece of copy paper and marking it with a pencil. Flip the paper and mark it the same way on the other side, then connect the 2 marks with a straight line. Next, use scissors to cut along the line so you end up with 2 identical pieces of paper. Then, grasp one of the pieces by the narrowest end and roll it tightly towards the outer edge of the paper. Finally, use a piece of thick wire to push the center out so the tip is pencil-shaped, and secure the paper with a small piece of tape.
54096.pred: To make a tortillon, you will need a tortilla, ground meat, and cheese. First, place the tortilla on a paper towel and add a spoonful of ground meat in the center. Fold the tortilla in half and press down gently to seal the edges. Then, place the tortilla in a pan with oil and cook until it is golden brown on both sides. Finally, remove the tortillon from the pan and place it on a paper towel to absorb any excess oil.

54315.question: How To Insert a Male Catheter
54315.gt: To insert a male catheter, start by washing your hands and the area around your penis with warm water and soap. Put lubricating jelly on the first 10 inches of the catheter and get into a seated position with your legs bent. Use your non-dominant hand to hold your penis straight out in front of your body and slowly insert the end of the catheter into the opening at the top of your penis. Push the catheter in about 7 to 10 inches or until urine starts to flow through it. As soon as you are done urinating, pinch the top of the catheter closed with your dominant hand and slowly pull it out. Keep the end facing upward so no urine spills out.
54315.pred: To insert a male catheter, you need to first open the packaging and then insert the catheter into your penis. You can use a little bit of pressure to help it go in. Once you see urine, you can hold on to the bag and let the urine flow out.

54361.question: How To Wash Egg off a House
54361.gt: Washing egg off your house probably isn’t how you'd like to spend your time, but fortunately you can easily remove egg stains with household items. If you can, remove the excess egg before it dries, since this will be much easier. Wipe it away with a cloth or scrape it off with a dull knife. If you have a hose in your garden, spray the egg away with water. To get rid of any dried stains, try mixing 1 cup of non-bleach laundry detergent into a bucket of warm water. Then, scrub your wall with the water and a hard-bristled brush. Alternatively, mix 1 cup each of white vinegar and warm water in a spray bottle. Then, spray the egg stains with it and scrub them off with a sponge. For tougher stains, try using a paint scraper.
54361.pred: To wash egg off a house, you can use a pressure washer to spray water on the roof and remove the egg stains. You can also use a ladder to reach the roof and spray the water on the roof. Additionally, you can use a hose to spray water on the roof and remove the egg stains.

55245.question: How To Artificially Inseminate a Dog
55245.gt: Before artificially inseminating your dog, take it to your vet to make sure it’s in good health. If so, the vet will collect the semen and examine it to make sure the sperm cells look normal. If you don't plan on using the semen right away, ask your vet to chill or freeze it. Once the female dog is ready, the vet will use a pipette to insert the semen in to the uterus.
55245.pred: To artificially inseminate a dog, you need to collect the semen from the male dog's penis and then transfer it to the female dog's vagina. The semen should be collected in a sterile container and then injected into the female dog's vagina using a syringe. The timing of the insemination is crucial, and it is recommended to consult a dog breeding guide for more information.

56361.question: How To Clean a Memory Foam Pillow
56361.gt: To remove a stain from a memory foam pillow, mix equal parts water and vinegar in a spray bottle. If you want to cut the vinegar smell, add a squeeze of fresh lemon juice to the mixture. Remove the pillowcase to directly spray the stain. After 5 minutes, use a damp cloth to blot the affected area. If the stain doesn't lift immediately, repeat the process until it does. Finally, to deodorize and disinfect your pillow, hang it on a clothesline in the bright sunlight!
56361.pred: To clean a memory foam pillow, first, remove the pillow from the pillowcase. Then, use a vacuum cleaner to remove any loose dirt and debris from the surface of the pillow. After that, use a damp cloth to wipe down the entire surface of the pillow. Make sure to apply gentle pressure to avoid damaging the memory foam. Finally, let the pillow air dry completely before putting it back in the pillowcase.

56404.question: How To Make a Simple Homemade Incubator for Chicks
56404.gt: If you want to raise chicks at home with an incubator, purchase a styrofoam cooler and cut a hole in one end. Then, slide the socket of a lamp and a 25 watt light bulb through the hole, and duct tape around the hole on the inside and outside of the container. Use chicken wire to divide the container in half, with the bulb on one side of the container to prevent the chicks from getting burned. Next, place a digital thermometer and humidity gauge in the box along with a bowl of water, and turn the light on to test the incubator.
56404.pred: To make a simple homemade incubator for chicks, you will need a white plastic container, a light bulb, a digital display, and a power supply. First, cut a hole in the container and insert the light bulb. Then, connect the power supply to the light bulb and the digital display. Finally, place the chicks in the container and turn on the light bulb to create a warm environment for the chicks to hatch.

56653.question: How To Make French Dressing
56653.gt: To make a basic French dressing, start by pureeing ketchup, sugar, vinegar, water, garlic salt, black pepper, and salt in a blender. While pureeing, slowly pour 1 cup of vegetable oil in. Once all of the ingredients are incorporated, chill the dressing for a few hours before using. You can store the dressing in the refrigerator in an airtight container for 1 week.
56653.pred: To make French dressing, you will need the following ingredients: 1/2 cup of sunflower oil, 1/2 teaspoon of salt, 3 tablespoons of ketchup, 1 1/2 tablespoons of onion, 2 pinches of black pepper, 1/4 cup of white vinegar, 1/2 small clove of garlic, 3/4 teaspoon of mustard, 3 tablespoons of maple syrup, and 2 1/2 tablespoons of paprika. First, pour the sunflower oil into a blender. Then, add the salt, ketchup, onion, black pepper, white vinegar, garlic, mustard, maple syrup, and paprika. Blend the ingredients together until they are well combined. Once the dressing is blended, pour it into a bowl and serve it with your favorite salad. Enjoy!

57842.question: How To Make Creamy Broccoli Soup
57842.gt: To make creamy broccoli soup, start by chopping the broccoli into small pieces. In a pan, saute an onion in olive oil until it's translucent before adding the stock and a diced potato. When the mixture starts bubbling, let it simmer for 12 minutes. Then, add the broccoli and simmer the soup for another 10 minutes. Finish by pureeing the soup with a handheld blender and adding cream and seasoning.
57842.pred: To make creamy broccoli soup, you need to start by putting oil in a big pot and cooking it on medium heat. Then, cook the celery and onion for about 4 minutes or until they are soft. After that, put in the potatoes and the broccoli stems and cook for approximately 2 more minutes. Next, put in the chicken broth and the almond milk, let the mix boil, and then put in the spices. Reduce the heat, place a lid on the pot, and cook the mixture for approximately 20 minutes. Once the vegetables are becoming soft, put the mix in a blender and mix until it becomes smooth.

58304.question: How To Make Beignets
58304.gt: To make beignets, start by dissolving yeast in a bowl of warm water and then adding evaporated milk, sugar, eggs, flour, and shortening. Then, mix everything together until a dough forms and chill the dough in the fridge for 24 hours. Next, roll the dough out flat and cut it into small squares. When you're finished cutting the dough, heat some vegetable oil in a large saucepan and fry a few of the dough squares at a time for 2-3 minutes. Finally, top the beignets with powdered sugar before serving.
58304.pred: To make beignets, you will need to start by mixing together the ingredients for the dough, which include flour, sugar, and yeast. Once the dough is mixed, it should be kneaded until it becomes smooth and elastic. After kneading, the dough should be left to rise for a few hours. Once the dough has risen, it should be rolled out and cut into small pieces. These pieces should then be shaped into the desired beignet shape and placed on a baking sheet. The beignets should be baked in the oven until they are golden brown. Finally, the beignets should be dusted with powdered sugar and served.

58634.question: How To Test Soil pH
58634.gt: To test your soil’s pH, first, go online or to your local garden center and buy pH test strips, which are also called litmus paper. Then, take a handful of the soil you want to test and mix it with just enough distilled water to give it the consistency of a milkshake. Next, put the test strip into the dirt mixture and hold it there for 20-30 seconds. Remove it from the dirt and dip it quickly into distilled water to clean it off. Finally, you can determine your soil’s pH by comparing the strip's coloration to the color-coded key that came with the test strips.
58634.pred: To test soil pH, you will need a small container, a pH paper, and a small amount of soil. First, fill the container with soil and add water to create a mixture. Next, dip the pH paper into the mixture and wait for a few seconds. Finally, compare the color of the pH paper to the chart provided to determine the pH level of the soil.

59313.question: How To Make a Green Smoothie
59313.gt: To make a green smoothie, start by pouring liquid such as water, soy milk, or regular milk into a blender. Next, add chopped fruit and greens, and pulse the mixture a few times to break up the ingredients. Afterwards, blend on a low speed for 30 seconds, then switch to the high speed and blend until everything is smooth. At this point, add some ice cubes or frozen fruit if you want your smoothie extra cold, and blend until smooth.
59313.pred: To make a green smoothie, you will need a blender, a cutting board, a knife, and a variety of fruits and vegetables. First, cut up the fruits and vegetables on the cutting board. Then, place the ingredients into the blender and blend them together until smooth. Finally, pour the smoothie into a glass and enjoy!

59726.question: How To Refinish Particle Board Cabinets
59726.gt: If your particle board cabinets are looking worse for wear, you can easily refinish them yourself. All you’ll need is painter’s tape, sandpaper, primer, paint, and a clear varnish. Use an oil-based primer and an acrylic or oil-based paint. Before you begin, cover any areas you don’t want painted with tape. You’ll need to sand the surfaces, apply a coat of primer, then paint your cabinets. It’ll take 24 to 48 hours for each coat of your primer and paint to dry. You might need more than 1 coat of paint to achieve the color you want. After your final coat has dried, apply a layer of clear varnish to protect the paint.
59726.pred: To refinish particle board cabinets, you should first remove the doors and drawers, then sand the surfaces with a mouse sander to remove the shiny finish. After that, vacuum the area and wipe the surfaces with tack cloths. Next, spray the surfaces with an oil-based spray primer and let it dry. Once dry, sand the cabinets with 220-grit sandpaper and wipe them down again. Then, buy high-quality interior paint and apply it to the cabinets using a small foam roller set for doors and large areas, and a paint brush for crevices and smaller areas. Allow the paint to dry and let it cure for 2 days to 2 weeks. Finally, reattach the hardware and drawers, and clean up the area using a shop vacuum and detergent.

59773.question: How To Make Curry Puffs
59773.gt: To make curry puffs, start by boiling potatoes until tender and cutting them into small pieces. Next, blanch peas and sauté onions. Add curry powder, turmeric, chili powder, black pepper, and salt to the pan with the peas and potatoes. Then, to make the pastry, mix flour, salt, and shortening in a bowl, add warm water, and knead. After allowing the dough to rest, roll it out, cut it in circles, and fill them with the potato mixture. Pinch the stuffed circles closed and fry them in oil until golden brown.
59773.pred: To make curry puffs, you will need to start by chopping onions and sautéing them in a pan with oil. Then, add the other ingredients such as carrots, peas, and spices to the pan and cook until the vegetables are soft. Next, cut the dough into small pieces and roll them out into thin circles. Place a spoonful of the cooked vegetable mixture onto the dough and roll it up into a cone shape. Brush the top of the cone with an egg wash and bake in the oven until golden brown. Once done, the curry puffs are ready to be served.

59986.question: How To Build an Ant Farm
59986.gt: To build an ant farm, start by placing a lidded glass jar inside a larger one and filling in the area between them with a mixture of slightly damp dirt and sand. Next, find some ants in your yard and gather them up using a large spoon. Once you’ve collected about 25 ants, put them in the large jar with the dirt. Then, put the lid on the large jar and use an awl or sharp knife to poke tiny holes in it so the ants can breathe. Finally, keep the jar covered with a black cloth while you’re not watching them to encourage them to dig closer to the sides of the jar.
