60376.question: How To Make a Fish Trap
60376.gt: The best way to make a fish trap depends on what you fish for. Make a smaller trap if you fish for minnows or pan fish. Make a larger trap if you fish for catfish, carp, or suckers. Arrange 12 pieces of lumber into the shape of a cube and nail them together with a hammer. Wrap wire mesh around 3 sides the frame if you fish for minnows or pan fish, and wrap poultry netting around the 3 sides if you fish for catfish, carp, or suckers. Secure the mesh or netting to the edges of the frame with snap ties. Then, create a funnel with the mesh or netting and use it to cover the open side of the cube.
60376.pred: To make a fish trap, you will need a plastic container, a fishing line, and a fishing hook. First, fill the container with water and attach the fishing line to the container. Then, attach the fishing hook to the fishing line and place it in the water. The fish will be attracted to the bait and will get caught in the trap.

60911.question: How To Tie Dye Using Rit Powder
60911.gt: If you want to tie dye some of your fabrics, Rit powder will give you more control over mixing colors. Start by gathering your supplies, including plastic bags, newspaper, gloves, rubber bands, a large tub, hot water, and vinegar or salt. Then, bunch up and twist your fabric and wrap rubber bands around it to hold it together and create your tie-dye pattern. Place rubber bands around the twisted fabric at intervals to separate the colors. Next, fill a 3-gallon bucket with your dye solution, which you'll want to make according to the instructions on the box. To make sure your colors are vibrant, add 1 cup of salt or vinegar to your solution. Either dip your fabric into the desired colors or submerge your entire piece into the bucket for a single color. Once you’ve applied all of your colors, rinse your fabric under hot water. Then, gradually decrease the water temperature until the water runs clear.
60911.pred: To tie dye using rit powder, first, you need to prepare the dye by mixing it with water. Then, you can use a plastic bag to tie the fabric and dip it into the dye. After that, you can rinse the fabric with water to remove the excess dye. Finally, you can hang the fabric to dry.

62185.question: How To Clean Upholstery with a Steam Cleaner
62185.gt: To clean upholstery with a steam cleaner, start by filling the steam cleaner with warm water and upholstery cleaner. Then, remove any pillows and cushions on your couch and use the steam cleaner to clean those first. To use the steam cleaner, simply press the button to spray the steam onto the upholstery and then vacuum up the moisture with the hose. When you're finished with the pillows and cushions, steam clean the rest of the couch and then let it air dry.
62185.pred: To clean upholstery with a steam cleaner, first, open the water tank of the steam cleaner and fill it with water. Then, use the steam cleaner to clean the upholstery by moving it back and forth over the surface. After cleaning, empty the dirty water from the tank into a sink.

62187.question: How To Fix Sagging Sofa Cushions
62187.gt: To fix sagging sofa cushions, start by unzipping the cushions, or opening them with a thread cutter if they don’t have zippers. Then, if your cushions have loose stuffing, add polyester fiberfill and distribute it evenly with your hands to plump up the cushions. Alternatively, wrap quilt batting around cushions that have pillow-like stuffing to give them more body. Finally, zip your cushions back up or sew them back together, then put them back on your sofa.
62187.pred: To fix sagging sofa cushions, you can follow these steps. First, remove the cushions from the sofa. Then, take a pillow and stuff it with a white pillow. Place the pillow on the sofa cushion and adjust it to fit properly. Finally, place the cushion back on the sofa. This will help to fix the sagging sofa cushions.

62194.question: How To Reupholster a Couch
62194.gt: To reupholster a couch, start by removing the old fabric, starting at the bottom of the sofa and working your way up. Next, cut out pieces of fabric that correspond with each section of the couch using the old fabric as a guide. Then, sew the seams together with a sewing machine and heavy duty thread. Finally, attach the fabric to the couch with a staple gun, working from the innermost parts of the couch outward.
62194.pred: To reupholster a couch, you will need a staple gun, scissors, and a staple gun. First, remove the old fabric from the couch. Then, cut the new fabric to the appropriate size and attach it to the couch using the staple gun. Finally, tuck in the material and staple it along the top of the back of the couch and at the bottom where the material is pulled through.

62332.question: How To Keep Ribbon from Fraying
62332.gt: Fabric ribbons tend to fray and separate at the edges, but you can keep your ribbon from fraying by cutting it at a diagonal and applying nail polish or glue at the edges. Snip the edge of your ribbon at a 45-degree angle or cut it in an inverted “v” shape, which will help with the fraying. Apply a thin layer of clear nail polish to the edges of the ribbon to help the fabric stay together. You can also apply an anti-fraying spray or clear craft glue to the tip of your ribbon to keep the threads together.
62332.pred: To keep ribbon from fraying, you can use a lighter to seal the ends of the ribbon. This will prevent the fraying and make the ribbon last longer.

62393.question: How To Make Grain Free Dog Treats
62393.gt: To make grain-free dog treats, remove the peel from 1 banana, put the fruit in a large bowl, and mash it with a fork. Next, add 3 tablespoons of smooth peanut butter and 1 large egg and stir until they're fully incorporated. Then, put 1¾ cup of garbanzo flour in a separate bowl, pour the banana mixture into it, and stir until the mixture forms a dough. Roll out the dough to be ¼ inch thick and use a knife or cookie cutter to cut out the individual treats. Finally, bake the treats at 300 degrees Fahrenheit for 30-40 minutes until they're golden brown.
62393.pred: To make grain-free dog treats, you will need to mix flour, water, and oil in a bowl. Then, add grated carrots and cheese to the mixture and knead it until it forms a dough. After that, roll the dough into a log shape and cut it into small pieces. Place the pieces on a baking sheet and bake them in the oven until they are golden brown.

62620.question: How To Make a Bottle Tree
62620.gt: A bottle tree is a great way to reuse old bottles and create an eye-catching sculpture. You’ll need at least a dozen wine and spirits bottles to make your bottle tree, but you can add bottles to the tree over time. You’ll also need a small dead tree, a premade bottle tree frame, or a frame you made yourself. All you need to do is remove the labels from the bottles, then slide them onto the branches so they're upside down. If you have a lot of bottles and the tree starts to waver, cement the tree into place or weigh down its base so it doesn’t blow over in a strong wind.
62620.pred: To make a bottle tree, you will need a metal pole, a hammer, and a drill. First, drill a hole in the top of the pole and insert a wire into it. Then, hammer the wire into the ground to secure the pole. Next, drill a hole in the bottom of the pole and insert a wire into it. Hammer the wire into the ground to secure the pole. Finally, attach the bottles to the wire using pliers.

62635.question: How To Make Wine Bottle Accent Lights
62635.gt: For a fun, creative, and customizable way to add a gentle glow to any room in your house, make your own wine bottle accent lights. You'll need to prepare the bottles by washing them in hot, soapy water and allowing them to dry completely. Plan to get a jig or base to hold your bottle steady so you can drill a hole in the center of the stopper. Also, you'll need to find a drill spot on the bottle, preferably somewhere on the back near the bottom. Once you drill your hole, you'll want to sand it down to avoid any sharp edges. You can then feed your string of lights into the bottle through the hole you just drilled. Then, plan to use the stopper to protect the cord from being cut by the raw glass edges of the hole.
62635.pred: To make wine bottle accent lights, you will need a wine bottle, a drill, a screw, and some string lights. First, drill a hole in the bottom of the wine bottle. Then, insert the screw into the hole and tighten it. Next, thread the string lights through the screw and into the bottle. Finally, turn on the lights and place the bottle in a dark room to see the effect.

62830.question: How To Clean with Rubbing Alcohol
62830.gt: Rubbing alcohol is a great product for cleaning and disinfecting your everyday items like mirrors, keyboards, and glass. Avoid cleaning your electronic screens, delicate fabrics, or finished wood, since the alcohol can damage them. Before you apply the rubbing alcohol, wipe your item with a clean, damp rag to get rid of any dirt or grease. Then, rinse your cloth and dampen it with rubbing alcohol. Wipe your item gently with the rag to get rid of any stains and sterilize it. To get into small crevices, try using a Q-tip. If there’s any residue left from the alcohol, wipe it up with a clean rag.
62830.pred: To clean with rubbing alcohol, you can use a rag to wipe down surfaces. In the video, a man is seen using a rag to clean a surface with rubbing alcohol.

62844.question: How To Make a Natural Disinfectant
62844.gt: To make a natural disinfectant out of vinegar, mix 1 part water, 1 part vinegar, and 5-15 drops of your favorite essential oil, like lemon, chamomile, or lavender. For general cleaning, pour the mixture into a spray bottle. If you would prefer to use disinfectant wipes, pour the vinegar mixture into a large glass jar and submerge 15-20 small squares of cloth in the liquid. When you’re ready to use a wipe, remove it from the jar and wring it out, then use it to wipe surfaces clean.
62844.pred: To make a natural disinfectant, you will need a jar, vinegar, and lemons. First, fill the jar with vinegar and add a few lemons. Then, close the jar and shake it well. The mixture will create a natural disinfectant that you can use to clean surfaces.

63396.question: How To Make Bhatura
63396.gt: To make bhatura, start by mixing active dry yeast in warm water and allowing it to sit for 10 minutes. Next, in a large bowl, mix maida, sooji, sugar, and salt. Then, add the yeast solution, oil, and yogurt, stirring all of the ingredients together until a soft dough forms. Once everything is combined, cover the bowl and let the dough rise in a warm location for 3 to 4 hours. After the dough doubles in volume, divide it into 8 equal balls and flatten them into circles with a rolling pin. Finally, fry each bhatura in hot oil until it’s golden brown.
63396.pred: To make bhatura, first grate the potatoes and add them to a bowl of flour. Mix in salt, curd, and water to form a soft dough. Knead the dough and let it rest for 10 minutes. Then, roll out the dough into small balls and flatten them into circles. Heat oil in a pan and fry the bhatura until golden brown. Serve with chole.

64009.question: How To Make Gluten Free Flour
64009.gt: To make gluten free all-purpose flour, start by pouring brown rice flour, white rice flour, sweet rice flour, and tapioca flour into a large bowl. Next, add xanthan gum as a gluten replacement and to allow for better binding. Then, use a whisk to blend the ingredients together. After 3-5 minutes of mixing, transfer your flour mix to an air-tight container. You can use your gluten free all-purpose flour as a substitute for regular flour.
64009.pred: To make gluten-free flour, you can follow the steps shown in the video. First, you need to measure out the flour using a measuring cup. Then, you can add other ingredients like baking powder and salt to the flour. After that, you can mix the ingredients together in a bowl. Finally, you can store the flour in a container for later use.

64286.question: How To Clean Felt
64286.gt: To clean felt, start by dabbing a small amount of gentle dish soap, such as Ivory or Dawn, directly onto the stain and blotting it with a soft, damp cloth. Alternatively, try using diluted white vinegar for stains that are particularly stubborn. Then, rinse the cloth with cool water to remove any soap or vinegar and use it to blot the stained felt again. Repeat this process until all the soap or vinegar has been rinsed from the felt. Afterwards, firmly press a clean, dry towel onto the area to soak up any excess moisture before allowing the felt to dry in a cool place.
64286.pred: To clean felt, you can use a pencil to rub the felt and remove any dirt or debris. This method is effective in removing any unwanted marks or stains from the felt.

64327.question: How To Clean a Ceramic Sink
64327.gt: One way to clean your ceramic sink is to use baking soda, a soft sponge, and lemon juice. Use water to moisten your sink and sponge and then sprinkle 1/2 cup of baking soda all over the sink. Scrub the sink with your sponge until all debris has been removed and then rinse the sink with water. After it has been cleaned, brighten your sink by squeezing lemon juice all over and letting it sit for 30 minutes before rinsing.
64327.pred: To clean a ceramic sink, first, pour Bar Keepers Friend cleanser and polish into the sink. Then, use a blue sponge to scrub the sink thoroughly. Rinse the sink with water and wipe it with a paper towel.

64338.question: How To Clean a Kitchen Sink
64338.gt: To clean a stainless steel kitchen sink, mix together 1 teaspoon of baking soda and 1/4 cup of lemon juice and pour this mixture all over your sink. Let it sit for 10 minutes before rinsing it with hot or boiling water. To clean the drain, mix 1/2 cup of baking soda with 1/4 cup of lemon juice. Pour this directly into the drain, and follow it with 1/2 cup of white vinegar. Cover the drain with a plug and let it soak for 5-10 minutes while you boil some water. After it has soaked, pour the boiling water down the drain.
64338.pred: To clean a kitchen sink, first, pour some dish soap into the sink and add water. Then, use a sponge to scrub the sink thoroughly. Rinse the sink with water and wipe it with a towel.

64342.question: How To Clean a Meat Grinder
64342.gt: To clean a meat grinder, start by feeding bread into the machine to to soak up any oil and grease. If your grinder is electric, simply wipe everything down with a damp towel. Otherwise, take apart the grinder and soak all of its parts in a large bucket of soapy water for about 20 minutes. To maintain your meat grinder, keep the meat and the parts cold for easier clean up, and hand wash the grinder after each use.
64342.pred: To clean a meat grinder, first, remove the attachment and wash it under running water. Then, use a brush to clean the inside of the grinder. Finally, rinse the grinder and let it dry before reassembling it.

64343.question: How To Clean a Range Hood
64343.gt: If you need to clean your range hood, make sure you use a cleaner that's appropriate for the material, such as soapy water for a plastic hood and copper cleaner for copper. Spray the cleaner onto the outside of the hood, then wipe it off and dry the hood with a paper towel. To make cleaning the inside easier, boil a pot of water so the steam loosens the grime on the hood. Next, test spray your cleaner on a small area before applying it to the hood if it causes no damage. When the hood is clean, wipe off the cleaner with a damp towel.
64343.pred: To clean a range hood, first, remove the filter and place it in a tray. Then, spray the filter with a cleaning solution and let it soak for a few minutes. After that, rinse the filter with water and dry it with a towel. Finally, reinstall the filter in the range hood.

64430.question: How To Clean out Your Closet
64430.gt: As you start clearing everything from your closet, try on your clothes and sort them into four piles to keep, store, sell, and donate. Let go of anything that doesn’t fit or you haven’t worn in over a year. Try selling high quality clothes and accessories online or at a local consignment shop, and if you can’t, donate them to a local charity. Be sure to then organize the clothes you keep by color or type, and utilize any storage containers or racks.
64430.pred: To clean out your closet, start by taking everything out of it and sorting through the clothes. Then, organize the clothes by type, such as shirts, pants, and dresses. Hang the clothes back up in the closet, and make sure to fold the clothes neatly. Finally, put the clothes back in the closet and enjoy your newly organized space.

64758.question: How To Use a Chocolate Fountain
64758.gt: To use a chocolate fountain, start by buying a couverture chocolate, which contains higher levels of cocoa butter, for best results. Alternatively, add a tablespoon of canola oil to every 5 pounds of chocolate you use to smooth the chocolate's texture. Next, melt the chocolate for 3 minutes in the microwave, or in a double boiler. When you're ready to set up the fountain, pour the chocolate into the fountain base and turn the fountain on.
64758.pred: To use a chocolate fountain, first, you need to fill the machine with water and turn it on. Then, you can add chocolate to the top of the fountain and let it flow down. You can also add other toppings like fruit or marshmallows to the fountain. Finally, you can dip your favorite treats into the fountain and enjoy the delicious chocolate fountain.

64901.question: How To Feel Like Eating Breakfast First Thing in the Morning
64901.gt: You may find it hard to feel like eating breakfast first thing in the morning, but there are things you can do to help! Try to avoid eating anything for about 2-3 hours before you go to bed each night so you’ll be more hungry when you wake up. Set your alarm a little earlier than normal to give yourself plenty of time to eat, and do about 30 minutes of light exercise, like push-ups or sit-ups, to work up an appetite. Over time, this should help your body get used to eating in the mornings.
64901.pred: To feel like eating breakfast first thing in the morning, you can start by waking up early and having a healthy breakfast. You can also try doing some light exercise, such as push-ups, to get your blood flowing and increase your appetite. Additionally, you can set an alarm to remind you to eat breakfast and make sure to have a variety of healthy foods to choose from.

64963.question: How To Make a Duck Fart
64963.gt: To make a simple duck fart, pour Kahlua into a shot glass so it’s a little less than half full. Then, hover a spoon upside down in the glass and pour Bailey’s Irish Cream over the spoon until it is near the top. Top off the drink with Crown Royal and drink the whole shot in one go so the flavors mix properly.
64963.pred: To make a duck fart, you will need a bowl, a spoon, a knife, a jar of peanut butter, a bottle of chocolate syrup, and a bag of siccors. First, scoop some peanut butter into the bowl and mix it with the chocolate syrup. Then, use the knife to cut the siccors into small pieces and add them to the bowl. Mix everything together until it forms a paste. Finally, use the spoon to scoop out the paste and place it on a plate. The paste will resemble a duck fart.

65025.question: How To Make Feeding Comfortable for Arthritic Dogs
65025.gt: Even everyday activities like eating can be difficult for arthritic dogs, but you can make this a bit easier by raising your dog’s food bowl slightly off the ground on a small coffee table or cardboard box. While this makes it easier for your dog to eat, a raised bowl has a slightly higher risk of bloat, so watch for whining or excessive scratching after eating and give your dog 90 minutes to rest after eating before giving it exercise. If you feed your dog in the kitchen or another place with slippery floors, put down runners or rugs where your dog eats to lower its risk of it falling down. You might want to also consider moving your dog’s dish to a carpeted room, although this can get messy if your pup is a sloppy eater.
65025.pred: To make feeding comfortable for arthritic dogs, it is recommended to use a syringe to feed them. The syringe can be used to administer food directly into the dog's mouth, which can help reduce the strain on their joints and make the feeding process more comfortable. Additionally, it is important to ensure that the dog is comfortable and relaxed during the feeding process, and to avoid any sudden movements or changes in the dog's environment.

66756.question: How To Make Apple Cinnamon Oatmeal
66756.gt: To make apple cinnamon oatmeal, start by bringing a pot of water to a boil, then add the oats. Cook the oats on a medium heat until the water has been absorbed. Using a smaller saucepan, heat the bite-sized pieces of apples and brown sugar over a medium heat. When the apples are soft, stir the mixture into the oatmeal, divide it into 2 bowls, and serve immediately.
66756.pred: To make apple cinnamon oatmeal, you will need to start by cutting up an apple and placing it in a bowl. Then, add oats, cinnamon, and vanilla to the bowl. Next, pour the mixture into a crockpot and cook it on high for 4 hours. Once the oatmeal is cooked, remove it from the crockpot and serve it in a bowl.

66758.question: How To Make Baked Oatmeal
66758.gt: To make baked oatmeal, start by mixing the old fashioned oats, baking powder, cinnamon, salt, and brown sugar in a large bowl and milk, eggs, and vanilla in a separate bowl. Stir as you pour the wet mixture and melted butter into the big bowl with the dry mixture. Once all the ingredients are mixed, pour the oatmeal into a buttered baking dish and bake it at 350°F for up to 45 minutes. After 45 minutes, take the oatmeal out of the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before eating it.
66758.pred: To make baked oatmeal, you will need to mix oats, milk, and other ingredients in a bowl. Then, pour the mixture into a baking dish and bake it in the oven. Once it is done, you can add toppings like chopped apples, raisins, and cinnamon to make it more delicious.

67098.question: How To Keep a Cut Apple from Turning Brown
67098.gt: To keep a cut apple from turning brown, combine 1 tbsp of lemon juice and 1 cup (240 ml) of water in a large bowl. Add your apple pieces to the bowl. Soak the apple pieces in the mixture for 3-5 minutes. Drain them and rinse them off with cool water. If you aren't serving them right away, put the apple pieces in a resealable bag and close it tightly, taking care to remove all the air. Keep the cut apples in your fridge until you're ready to enjoy them.
67098.pred: To keep a cut apple from turning brown, you can soak it in lemon juice.

67160.question: How To Pickle Okra
67160.gt: Before pickling okra, sterilize the jars, lids, and tops by submerging them in boiling water for 10 minutes, then placing them on a clean towel. Next, heat the pickling spices with water, white vinegar, sugar, and salt until it comes to a boil. At that point, reduce the heat to a simmer, pack the jars with okra, and pour in the hot pickling juice. Then, put on the lids and submerge the jars in boiling water for 10 minutes. Afterwards, remove the jars from the boiling water, and let the pickled okra sit for at least 1 week before using.
67160.pred: To pickle okra, first, wash the okra and place it in a pot of water. Then, add vinegar and boil the mixture. After boiling, pour the mixture into jars and seal them.

67211.question: How To Make Your Clothes Smell Good
67211.gt: If you’re washing your clothes with detergent regularly and they still smell bad, try storing your clothes with good-smelling items like scented sachets or scented dryer sheets. Add a few drops of perfume to a piece of fabric and store the fabric with your clothes, or spray an air freshener into your closet or dresser. Place an open container of baking soda in your closet or dresser to absorb bad smells.
67211.pred: To make your clothes smell good, you can use a mixture of water and vinegar. First, mix the vinegar with water in a bowl. Then, use a sponge to apply the mixture to the clothes. Make sure to cover the entire surface of the clothes. Once you have applied the mixture, let the clothes sit for a few minutes. This will allow the vinegar to penetrate the fabric and remove any odors. After a few minutes, rinse the clothes with water to remove any remaining vinegar. Finally, hang the clothes to dry. This will help to remove any remaining moisture and allow the clothes to dry completely.

67219.question: How To Wash a Zipper Hoodie
67219.gt: You’ll want to wash your zipper hoodie every 6 or 7 wears to keep it clean. To wash it in a machine, close the zipper so it doesn’t snag on the fabric or get damaged. Then, turn it inside out to protect the color and texture of the inside fabric. Use a mild detergent, but avoid fabric softener and dryer sheets since these can damage the fabric. Set your washer to its delicate cycle and wash your hoodie in cold water to help preserve the color and any graphics on it.
67219.pred: To wash a zipper hoodie, first, put it inside out. Then, place it in the washing machine and add a wash pod. Turn down the temperature and start the machine. After washing, hang the hoodie on a drying rack.

67224.question: How To Wash Clothes by Hand
67224.gt: To wash clothes by hand, start by separating your lights and darks like you would if you were machine washing them. Next, fill a sink or tub with warm water and pour in some laundry detergent. Then, submerge your light clothes in the water and swish them around with your hands. After a few minutes, take your clothes out and rinse them under a faucet or in a different container filled with clean water. When you're done washing your lights, repeat the process with your darks. Finally, lay your clothes on a flat, clean surface to air dry.
67224.pred: To wash clothes by hand, first, fill a bucket with water and add detergent. Then, add the clothes to the bucket and mix them with your hands. Rinse the clothes in the bucket and then transfer them to another bucket of water. Finally, hang the clothes on a clothesline to dry.

67233.question: How To Wash Tulle
67233.gt: To wash tulle attached to a dress or outfit, turn the garment inside out and zip and button all of the closures. If your tulle isn't attached to an outfit, you don't need to do any prep. Next, place the tulle in a mesh laundry bag to protect the delicate fabric and place it in your washing machine. Then, add a mild detergent and wash the tulle in cold water using a gentle cycle. Finally, hang the tulle up to air-dry or tumble-dry it using low heat.
67233.pred: To wash tulle, you should first remove any embellishments or attachments. Then, hand wash the tulle in cold water with a mild detergent. Gently agitate the tulle in the water, avoiding wringing or twisting. Rinse thoroughly and lay the tulle flat to dry. Do not use a dryer or hang the tulle to prevent damage.

68056.question: How To Make Switchel
68056.gt: To make a refreshing batch of switchel, start by combining apple cider vinegar, maple syrup and ginger in a large jar or pitcher. Be careful not to add too much syrup, since maple syrup is very sugary. Next, add water and shake your container, or stir the mixture thoroughly with a spoon. If you’d prefer to use seltzer, add it right before serving to keep your carbonated water from going flat. Serve immediately, or let the switchel steep for 12 to 24 hours to strengthen the flavor.
68056.pred: To make switchel, you will need to mix water, yeast, honey, and flour in a bowl. After mixing, knead the dough and let it rest for 30 minutes. Then, spread olive oil on the dough and poke holes in it. Finally, bake the dough in the oven for 20 minutes at 430 degrees Fahrenheit.

68167.question: How To Build Porch Steps
68167.gt: If you want to build porch steps, measure from the top of the porch to the ground, then take the total height and divide it by the riser, which is usually between 6 and 8 inches. For example, divide 35 inches by a 7 inch riser to get 5 steps. Next, mark the steps on your stringers, cut out the steps with a saw, and attach the stringers to your porch. Connect the riser boards and treads, then finish your steps with a waterproof deck stain.
68167.pred: To build porch steps, you will need to start by measuring the porch and cutting the wood to the appropriate size. Then, you will need to drill holes in the wood and attach the steps to the porch. Finally, you will need to sand the wood and paint it to give it a finished look.

68174.question: How To Clean a Composite Deck
68174.gt: To clean a composite deck, sweep it with a broom or leaf blower at least once a week to get rid of dirt and debris. If your deck is still dirty, hose it down, scrub with a brush and soap, then, rinse with a hose. For a faster cleaning option, try using a pressure washer. Just let the machine scrub the deck while it sprays out water and soap. Then, use its water function to wash away the soap and fan function to dry the deck.
68174.pred: To clean a composite deck, first, use a pressure washer to remove dirt and grime. Then, use a brush to scrub the deck and remove any remaining dirt. Finally, use a hose to rinse the deck and remove any remaining dirt.

68250.question: How To Cook Chorizo
68250.gt: To cook chorizo on the stove, start by putting it in a non-stick skillet on medium-high heat. Cook the chorizo for 5 minutes, turning it frequently so it browns on all sides. Then, reduce the heat to medium-low and add ½ a cup of water. Finally, cover the skillet and simmer the chorizo for 12 minutes. For oven-cooked chorizo, set your broiler on high and give it 5-10 minutes to heat up. When the broiler is ready, you can put the chorizo on a broiler pan and broil it for 11-12 minutes, turning it every 4 minutes so it cooks evenly.
68250.pred: To cook chorizo, first, cut the chorizo into small pieces and place them in a pan. Then, add oil to the pan and cook the chorizo until it is browned. Finally, add onions to the pan and cook until the onions are soft.

68265.question: How To Cure Pork
68265.gt: To cure pork, start by mixing water, sugar, and salt in a large pot. Then, add bay, pepper, clove, allspice, garlic, and thyme to the pot. Once you've prepared the curing mixture, put the pork in the pot and weigh it down with a plate so it's completely submerged. Next, put the lid on the pot and refrigerate the pork for 5 days. After 5 days, remove the pork and pat it dry before cooking.
68265.pred: To cure pork, first, cut the fat off the meat and place it in a tray. Then, add salt and other seasonings to the meat and mix it well. After that, put the meat in a plastic bag and seal it tightly. Finally, let the meat sit in the fridge for a few days to cure.

68285.question: How To Make Kielbasa
68285.gt: To make kielbasa, cut the meat into pieces that are small enough to fit into the grinder, mix in the spices, and grind the meat. Next, fit a casing over the stuffing tube, fill the sausage stuffer with meat, and crank the machine so the sausage fills the casing. Tie off the casing at the front end, then pinch the sausage with your thumb and forefinger every 6 inches. Lastly, hang the sausage in a cool, dry storage area for 1 hour, then smoke and cold shock your kielbasa!
68285.pred: To make kielbasa, you will need to mix ground meat with salt, pepper, and other seasonings. Then, you will need to stuff the mixture into a casing and cook it on a grill.

68304.question: How To Pickle Pork
68304.gt: To quickly pickle pork to add flavor to the meat, place it in a large pot with apple cider vinegar, sugar, soy sauce, bay leaves, and garlic. Then, pour enough water into the pot to completely cover the pork. Next, let the pork marinate in the pot for 1 hour so the flavors have time to infuse with the meat. Finally, move the pot to the stove, and simmer everything over low heat for 30 minutes before serving.
68304.pred: To pickle pork, you will need to prepare a mixture of ingredients, including apple cider vinegar, Morton kosher salt, and other seasonings. You will also need to prepare a pot of boiling water and add the pork to it. After boiling, you will need to rinse the pork in cold water and then place it in a plastic bag. Finally, you will need to add the mixture of ingredients to the bag and seal it.

68558.question: How To Bathe a Chicken
68558.gt: To bathe your chicken, start by filling 2 large containers with warm water, and putting 5-6 drops of dish soap into 1 of them before adding the water. Then, pick your chicken up with its wings pressed against its body, and put it into the soapy water. Keep 1 hand on the bird’s wings and use the other hand to rub soapy water over its feathers. When your chicken is soaped up, move it into the clean water, and rinse it thoroughly. Finally, remove your chicken from the water and pat it dry with a towel, then use a blow dryer on the lowest setting to finish drying it.
68558.pred: To bathe a chicken, first get the hen wet using a tub of warm water. Then, use a gentle pet shampoo to wash the chicken. Rinse the chicken thoroughly with water and dry it with a towel.

68569.question: How To Dye a Baby Chicken
68569.gt: To dye a baby chicken, collect eggs that are on their 11th to 14th day of incubation, and sterilize their shells using alcohol pads with 95 percent isopropyl alcohol. Then, use a clean hypodermic needle to puncture a small hole in the eggshell, about 1 half-inch from the small end of the egg. Make sure not to insert the needle too far, or you could damage the embryo, and do not reuse the same needle on different eggs to ensure sterility. From here, you should inject about .5 milliliters of vegetable food coloring into the egg, just under the shell and membrane, by inserting the tip of the needle into the hole.

68808.question: How To Make a Lavender Insect Repellent
68808.gt: To make your own lavender insect repellent, combine lavender essential oil with distilled water or apple cider vinegar. For example, mix 30 to 40 drops of lavender oil with 1.5 ounces of distilled water. Then, pour the mixture into a saucer and place it in an area where you’re seeing lots of insects. For a spray repellent you can use on your skin or clothes, combine 25 drops of lavender oil with ¼ cup of apple cider vinegar in a spray bottle. If the smell of vinegar is too strong for you, use ¼ cup of distilled water instead.
68808.pred: To make a lavender insect repellent, you will need a few fresh lavender sprigs, a small container, and a clear plastic bottle. First, cut the stems of the lavender sprigs to a length of about 6 inches. Then, place the cut stems into the small container and cover them with water. Allow the lavender to steep in the water for at least 24 hours. After the steeping process, strain the water into a clear plastic bottle. You can add a few drops of essential oil, such as peppermint or eucalyptus, to enhance the repellent's effectiveness. Finally, store the repellent in the plastic bottle and use it as needed to repel insects.

69001.question: How To Make Your Bedroom Better
69001.gt: To make your bedroom better, try using household items to change up its look. Place a blanket over your bed, or add a couple of plants to a shelf to bring some greenery indoors. Add decoration by using pictures, vases, or other nicknacks. If you enjoy crafts, try creating your own art to decorate the walls, such as collages, drawings or paintings on paper. For the floor, put down a rug to add some color. You could also hang a curtain or sheet behind your bed to make an inexpensive headboard.
69001.pred: To make your bedroom better, you can start by cleaning and organizing it. You can remove the bed sheets, vacuum the floor, and clean the furniture. You can also add some decorative items like a vase, a picture frame, and a stuffed animal to make the room more cozy and inviting. Additionally, you can add some plants to bring some life and freshness to the room.

69075.question: How To Make Mozzarella Sticks
69075.gt: To make mozzarella sticks, start by cutting mozzarella into small rectangles. If you want to bake them, dip the frozen sticks in flour, whisked eggs, and then breadcrumbs. Once they are prepared, bake them until the sticks are crisp. If you want crispier mozzarella sticks, consider frying them. To deep fry them, place the bread-crumb covered mozzarella in oil until it is golden brown. Once you’ve let the baked or fried mozzarella sticks cool, serve them with ketchup or sweet chili.
69075.pred: To make mozzarella sticks, you will need to cut a block of mozzarella cheese into sticks, dip them in beaten eggs, coat them in breadcrumbs, and then fry them in hot oil until they are golden brown.

69084.question: How To Remove the Rind from Brie Cheese
69084.gt: To remove the rind from brie cheese, wrap the brie tightly in plastic wrap, making sure the entire rind is covered. Place the brie in the freezer for at least 30 minutes so it can harden. Take the brie out of the freezer once it’s completely hardened and remove the plastic wrap. Using a serrated knife, carefully slice off both circular ends of the brie, then lay the brie flat on the cutting board and carefully slice the rind off the sides.
69084.pred: To remove the rind from brie cheese, you can use a knife to carefully slice off the outer layer.

69358.question: How To Make a Caesar Drink
69358.gt: To make the popular Canadian cocktail the Caesar, rim a large glass with lemon juice and celery salt and fill the glass about 3/4 of the way full of ice. Add between 1.5 and 3 oz of vodka, depending on how strong you want your drink to be, then top that with salt, pepper, hot sauce, and Worcestershire. Fill the glass almost to the top with Clamato juice, which is a mix of tomato juice and clam juice. Garnish the drink with a lemon or lime wedge or a celery stalk, then enjoy!
69358.pred: To make a caesar drink, you will need a glass, ice cubes, tomato juice, hot sauce, Worcestershire sauce, celery salt, and pickles. First, fill the glass with ice cubes. Then, pour tomato juice into the glass. Next, add hot sauce, Worcestershire sauce, and celery salt to taste. Finally, add pickles to the drink.

69723.question: How To Make a Deco Mesh Wreath
69723.gt: The easiest way to make a deco mesh wreath is to wrap pipe cleaners around a metal wreath frame every 1.5 inches. Then, fix a deco ribbon to the frame and twist the pipe cleaner to hold it in place. For best results, use a deco ribbon that’s at least 10 inches long. Continue threading the ribbon through each pipe cleaner until the ribbon is firmly in place. Make your wreath fuller by attaching another layer, or add additional decorations like ornaments and flowers!
69723.pred: To make a deco mesh wreath, you will need a wire wreath form, deco mesh, and wire cutters. First, cut the deco mesh into strips and wrap them around the wire wreath form, securing them with wire. Then, add any additional decorations, such as flowers or ribbons, to the wreath. Finally, hang the wreath on a door or wall and enjoy your beautiful creation.

70482.question: How To Clean up Battery Acid Spills
70482.gt: To clean up battery acid spills, first put on a pair of rubber gloves as well as a safety mask or goggles. Place the battery in 2 plastic bags, seal the bags tightly, and inspect the battery label to see what type it is. For an alkaline battery, clean up the spill using a mild acid like vinegar or lemon juice. If the batter is a lithium battery, wipe up the spill with a paper towel soaked in water. Be sure to dispose of the batteries as soon as the spill is cleaned.
70482.pred: To clean up battery acid spills, you can use a mixture of baking soda and water to neutralize the acid. Apply the mixture to the spill and let it sit for a few minutes before wiping it away with a clean cloth. If the spill is on a hard surface, you can also use a vacuum cleaner to remove the acid.

71215.question: How To Cut Strawberries for Every Occasion
71215.gt: While you may want to cut your strawberries differently depending on the occasion, always start by cleaning and hulling them. Rinse your berries under cool water and pick the green top stems off by gently twisting and pulling them. Put the tip of a paring knife into the top of the berry just outside the white center part and slide the knife around to cut out the hull, which is the most bitter part of the strawberry. For a quick snack, pie, tart, or smoothie, cut your strawberries in half vertically. If you’d prefer smaller pieces for a fruit salad, then slice them in quarters. You can also cut your berries into vertical slices if you want thinner pieces for a topping on a dessert or oatmeal.
71215.pred: To cut strawberries for every occasion, you can follow these steps. First, wash the strawberries thoroughly and pat them dry with a paper towel. Next, slice the strawberries in half lengthwise, then cut them into smaller pieces if needed. For a more elegant presentation, you can slice the strawberries into thin rounds or quarters. You can also cut them into small cubes for a more casual look. Finally, arrange the cut strawberries on a plate or in a bowl, and serve them with your favorite dessert or snack.

71239.question: How To Make Raspberry Puree
71239.gt: If you want to make raspberry puree on the stove, combine your raspberries, sugar, and lemon juice in a large saucepan. Place the mixture on the stove on medium heat for about 10 minutes. Stirring frequently. Once the raspberries are completely broken down, pour the mixture through a sieve or a strainer to remove the seeds. Serve the puree warm or chill it if you prefer a thicker puree. Raspberry puree will stay good for at least a week in the refrigerator.
71239.pred: To make raspberry puree, you will need to blend raspberries in a blender.

71250.question: How To Build a Birdhouse
71250.gt: To build a birdhouse, start by picking up some untreated wood and galvanized screws from your home improvement store. Use a bandsaw to cut your wood into several separate pieces, then paint or stain them however you'd like before assembling them to create the birdhouse structure. Once your birdhouse is complete, mount it to a pole or to the side of a building at least 5 feet off the ground!
71250.pred: To build a birdhouse, you will need to gather the necessary materials, such as wood, a saw, a drill, and a hammer. First, cut the wood into the desired shape and size for the birdhouse. Next, use the drill to make holes for the entrance and ventilation. Then, use the hammer to secure the pieces of wood together. Finally, attach the birdhouse to a post or tree using the drill.

72399.question: How To Kill Fleas With Dawn Dishsoap
72399.gt: If your pet has fleas, a Dawn dishsoap bath is a gentle remedy that can help get rid of them. Fill a bathtub or basin with lukewarm water that’s only about as deep as your pet’s belly, then put your pet in the water. Use your hands to wet your pet’s fur through to the skin, but be careful to avoid its eyes and ears. Next, use a little dish soap to lather up your pet’s fur. For most dogs and cats, 2 or 3 tablespoons of soap are a good starting point, but you can use more for a larger pet or a severe flea infestation. Work the soap into its fur with your fingers or a brush and make sure it gets all the way down to the skin. Let the dish soap sit for about 5 minutes, then rinse your pet thoroughly with clean water and rub it dry with a towel. If you still notice fleas on your pet after the bath, repeat the process.
72399.pred: To kill fleas with dawn dishsoap, you need to boil the dishsoap in a pot of water. Once the water boils, you can add the dishsoap to the pot and let it boil for a few minutes. After that, you can use a spoon to scoop out the dishsoap and place it on a plate. This will create a sticky substance that fleas will be attracted to. Once the fleas are attracted to the dishsoap, they will be killed.

72464.question: How To Make Pralines
72464.gt: To make traditional southern pralines, butter the sides of a saucepan and pour in sugar, salt, corn syrup, milk, and butter. Stir the ingredients together and cook them over medium heat until the sugar dissolves and the ingredients boil. Then, remove the saucepan from the heat and allow it to cool for 10 minutes. Once cooled, add pecans and vanilla and beat the mixture with a spoon for 2 minutes. Finally, use your spoon to drop the candy onto parchment paper, let it cool, and enjoy!
72464.pred: To make pralines, you will need to mix butter, sugar, and pecans in a pot. Then, you will need to pour the mixture onto a baking sheet and let it cool.

72888.question: How To Make a Dinosaur Cake
72888.gt: To make a stegosaurus shaped dinosaur cake, bake two round yellow cakes and let them cool. After they have cooled, stack your cakes on top of each other and cut the cakes across the middle so that one side is about 2/3 of the cake while the other is about 1/3. Use a cookie cutter to cut out the bottom section of your larger cake, so that it is U-shaped. Then, cut the smaller cake into sections to create the dinosaur's tail and neck. Frost with green buttercream icing and add Oreo thin crisps to make the plates of armor on the dinosaur's back and neck.
72888.pred: To make a dinosaur cake, you will need a cake, frosting, and decorations. First, frost the cake with your desired frosting. Then, use a piping bag to create the dinosaur figures on the cake. You can also use a knife to cut out shapes from the cake to create the dinosaurs. Finally, add any additional decorations, such as trees or rocks, to complete the design.

72892.question: How To Make a Heart Shaped Cake
72892.gt: To make a heart shaped cake, preheat your oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit, then mix together the dry ingredients in a mixing bowl. Next, beat in the wet ingredients until the batter is smooth, then fill either a heart-shaped mold or two cake pans, one rectangular and one circular. Then, bake the batter for 35 minutes, and let it cool for 15 minutes afterwards before you decorate. If you used the two-pan method, cut your rectangular cake at a diagonal and cut the circular cake in half to form your heart shape!
72892.pred: To make a heart-shaped cake, you will need a cake, a knife, a heart-shaped cake pan, and a heart-shaped chocolate. First, cut the cake into a heart shape using the knife. Then, place the heart-shaped cake pan on top of the cake and press it down to create a heart-shaped indentation. Next, pour the batter into the heart-shaped cake pan and bake it in the oven until it is fully cooked. Once the cake is done, remove it from the oven and let it cool down. Finally, place the heart-shaped chocolate on top of the cake and decorate it with frosting or other toppings.

72901.question: How To Make a Minion Cake
72901.gt: To make a minion cake, frost and stack 4 cakes on top of one another. Then, roll yellow fondant over the majority of the cake and use blue fondant to create the jumper and straps. Use the excess yellow fondant to make the arms and a small piece of white fondant to make the eye, which you can color with chocolate. Finally, use black rope licorice to make the goggle, mouth, and hair.
72901.pred: To make a minion cake, you will need a cake, frosting, and decorations. First, cut the cake into layers and spread frosting on each layer. Then, add decorations to the cake, such as eyes, a mouth, and a hat. Finally, add a candle to the cake and light it.

72919.question: How To Make Fairy Cakes
72919.gt: To make fairy cakes, start by beating 110 grams of softened, unsalted butter until it’s light and fluffy. Then, add 110 grams of caster sugar and continue mixing until combined. Next, beat together 2 eggs and 1 teaspoon of vanilla before gradually adding the liquid mixture to the butter-sugar mixture. After that, fold in 110 grams of flour, then add 1-2 tablespoons of milk, or enough that the batter drips slowly from a spoon turned upside down. Finally, fill cupcake tins ½ full of batter and bake your fairy cakes at 180°C for 8-10 minutes, or until golden brown.
72919.pred: To make fairy cakes, you will need to start by baking the cupcakes. Once they are baked, you can decorate them with frosting and sprinkles. You can also add a chocolate piece on top of the cupcake. Finally, you can add a cherry on top of the cupcake.

73271.question: How To Clean Your Dog's ID Tag
73271.gt: To clean your dog’s ID tag, soak it in a bowl of 2 cups of warm water and 1 tablespoon of washing up liquid once a week. After a few minutes, scrub the tag with a soft sponge until it turns shiny. If you still see dirt on the lettering after scrubbing the tag, use an old toothbrush to clean the letters. As an optional extra, give your tag additional shine by polishing it with natural ingredients, like ketchup for brass tags or olive oil if it’s made of stainless steel. Once you’re finished, dry the tag with a towel before reattaching it to your dog’s collar.
73271.pred: To clean your dog's id tag, you can use a damp cloth or a mild soap solution. Gently wipe the tag with the cloth or soak it in the solution, then rinse it with clean water and let it air dry. Avoid using harsh chemicals or abrasive materials that could damage the tag.

73278.question: How To Install Wire Fencing for Dogs
73278.gt: To install wire fencing for dogs, start by driving metal posts into the ground approximately 15 feet apart with a sledgehammer. Then, secure the wire to the first post using the metal clips that are attached to the post. Next, unroll your wire along the outside of the fence, and clip it to the post at the other end of the fence. Finally, clip the wire onto each post along the fence so it’s firmly in place.
73278.pred: To install wire fencing for dogs, you will need to follow these steps. First, you will need to dig a hole in the ground and place a wire in it. Then, you will need to connect the wire to a transmitter. After that, you will need to connect the wire to a receiver. Finally, you will need to connect the wire to a grounding wire.

73357.question: How To Dry Figs
73357.gt: To dry figs, start by cutting them in half with a knife. Then, place the figs on an oven-safe rack with ventilation holes so the cut sides are facing up. Next, set your oven to the lowest temperature setting and put the figs inside of it. Let the figs dry in the oven with the door propped open for up to 36 hours. Once the figs are dry, let them cool completely before serving or storing them for later.
73357.pred: To dry figs, first, cut them in half and remove the seeds. Then, place the figs on a wire rack and let them dry in the oven.

73392.question: How To Clean a Marble Shower
73392.gt: To clean a marble shower, start by filling a spray bottle with warm water and a teaspoon of mild, pH-neutral dish soap. Then, spray your shower with the solution and rub it in with a damp cloth using small, circular motions. Once you've gone over the entire surface of your shower, rinse the solution off with water. Finally, dry your marble shower off using a rag or squeegee.
73392.pred: To clean a marble shower, first, apply a cleaning solution to the tiles and let it sit for a few minutes. Then, use a sponge or cloth to scrub the tiles and rinse them with water. For tough stains, use a scrubbing brush or a power tool to remove them. Finally, dry the tiles with a clean cloth to prevent water spots.

73418.question: How To Clean Soap Scum from Glass Shower Doors
73418.gt: If you have soap scum on your glass shower doors, you can easily clean it off with a homemade cleaner. To make your own cleaner, all you'll need to do is boil vinegar in a small pot, then mix it with an equal amount of dish soap and pour it into a spray bottle. Let the mixture sit for 30 minutes to cool, spray your shower doors with it, and wipe it away with a clean microfiber cloth. Alternatively, you can mix 1/2 cup baking soda and 1/4 cup white vinegar into a paste and rub this on your shower doors. Leave it for 15 minutes to work its magic, then wipe it off. You can also use toilet bowl cleaner instead if you have this on hand, although it's not as effective as the other cleaners.
73418.pred: To clean soap scum from glass shower doors, first, use a green sponge to scrub the glass door. Then, mix baking soda and vinegar in a bowl and apply the mixture to the glass door. Finally, use a white cloth to wipe the glass door clean.

73788.question: How To Make Turkey Cupcakes
73788.gt: To make turkey cupcakes, beat the butter, vanilla, cocoa powder, milk, and sugar on low speed until the chocolate frosting is thick enough to spread. Next, spread an even layer of frosting on each cupcake with a spatula. Then, pipe a 1-inch mound of icing on one side of the cupcake to form the head. Pipe a smaller mound on the opposite side to create the tail. Finally, use 2 dots of white icing for the eyes and put 6-8 pieces of candy corn in the tail to look like feathers.

73856.question: How To Care for Poinsettias
73856.gt: To care for a poinsettia, first, choose a spot where your poinsettia can get 6 hours of indirect sunlight each day. For example, set it near a sunny window facing east or west. Try to keep the temperature around 70°F (21°C), and make sure it never gets colder than 50°F (10°C) since it's leaves could fall off if it gets too cold. Poinsettias don’t need a lot of water, but you should water your plant when the soil feels dry. As you water the poinsettia, stop as soon as you see water leak through the holes at the bottom to the pot. This will prevent overwatering. Poinsettias only bloom from November to March, so most people prefer to buy a new one every year for the holidays. If you’d prefer to keep your poinsettia year round, fertilize it with an all-purpose fertilizer in early January.
73856.pred: To care for poinsettias, it is important to keep them away from hot and cold drafts, as well as to water them regularly. Additionally, it is recommended to keep them in a well-lit area and to avoid exposing them to direct sunlight.

73887.question: How To Get Wisteria to Bloom
73887.gt: If you want to help your wisterias bloom, prune the branches on a mild day in February, then again to tame unruly growth in July. Use garden shears to prune long shoots so there are only 3-5 buds per shoot, and aim to cut away about half of the previous year’s growth. However, avoid cutting the woody frame of the plant. In the early spring, around April, add phosphate fertilizer to the ground around the tree, then add compost to the soil, topped by a 2-inch layer of mulch.
73887.pred: To get wisteria to bloom, you need to prune it in the fall and feed it in the spring.

73925.question: How To Grow Daylilies
73925.gt: Before growing daylilies, soak bare root plants in a water-soluble fertilizer the night before you plan on planting them. Then, plant the lilies 2 feet apart in a sunny, well-draining spot. After you’ve planted them, water the daylilies 3 times per week so they don’t dry out. After they are established, fertilize them once a year with water-soluble fertilizer.
73925.pred: To grow daylilies, you should plant them in a sunny location with well-draining soil. Water them regularly, but avoid overwatering. Fertilize them with a balanced fertilizer during the growing season. Deadhead spent blooms to encourage more flowers.

73927.question: How To Grow Dahlias in Pots
73927.gt: If you want to grow dahlias in pots, choose a pot that's at least 12 inches by 12 inches and fill it with a rich potting mix, like 2 parts compost to 1 part peat moss. Then, plant your dahlia tubers on their sides about 4-6 inches deep in the soil during spring. Once the tubers are planted, water the soil lightly so it's damp but not soaked, and mix a fertilizer into the top layer of soil. To help your plants grow, place the pot in an area that gets direct sunlight and water at least 2-3 times a week.
73927.pred: To grow dahlias in pots, you need to start by filling a pot with soil and then placing a plant in it. The man in the video demonstrates this process by filling a pot with soil and placing a plant in it. He then waters the plant and adds more soil around it. This is a simple and effective way to grow dahlias in pots.

73939.question: How To Grow Gerbera Daisies
73939.gt: To grow gerbera daisies, start your seeds indoors in a seed tray during the early spring, and then transplant the seedlings once they have 2 leaves. Plant them in an area with morning sun and afternoon shade, and add compost to the soil to help them grow. Once they’re in the ground, water them thoroughly every 3-5 days, and apply fertilizer to the soil once per week to keep them healthy. When the daisies have bloomed for the year, remove any dead flowers as they start to wilt to prevent diseases.
73939.pred: To grow gerbera daisies, you will need to plant them in a pot and water them regularly. You can also plant them in the ground and water them as needed. The video shows a woman planting a gerbera daisy in a pot and watering it.

73945.question: How To Grow Hollyhocks
73945.gt: To grow hollyhocks, start in the fall by sowing the seeds in individual peat pots, watering the pots, and leaving them by a window to start germinating. At the beginning of spring, take the hollyhocks out of the peat pots and plant them outside in moist soil. Once they’re planted, water the base of the plants daily for the first few weeks, then about twice per week for the rest of the growing season. Also, make sure to apply an organic flower fertilizer every 1 to 2 weeks to help improve flower yields.
73945.pred: To grow hollyhocks, you need to plant the seeds in the soil and water them regularly. You can also use a garden tool to loosen the soil around the plant and remove any weeds. Additionally, you can use a garden hose to water the plant and provide it with the necessary nutrients.

73949.question: How To Grow Iris
73949.gt: To grow irises, start in the late summer by picking a spot with well-draining soil that gets 6-8 hours of full sunlight every day. Then, plant your irises 1-2 feet apart in shallow dirt, with their roots spread downward and their tops slightly exposed to the air. After that, water your irises thoroughly, then water them every 7-10 days until the weather turns cool. Additionally, check your irises periodically for brown leaves or stalks, and remove them to keep your flowers healthy.
73949.pred: To grow iris, you need to plant the bulbs in the ground and water them regularly. The video shows a person planting a bulb in the ground and watering it. The video also shows a person holding a dead flower, which could be a sign that the plant needs more water or nutrients.

73951.question: How To Grow Lavender
73951.gt: To grow lavender, start by digging a hole in a spot with good drainage and full sun. Then, line the base of the hole with a mix of lime, manure, and bone meal. An hour before you transfer the lavender from its pot, water it so that the roots are hydrated, but not wet. Just before you plant the lavender, remove it gently from its pot and shake the soil from the roots. Next, place the plant in the hole you prepared and cover the roots with soil. Finally, cover the area with mulch to prevent weeds and water the lavender every 10 days.
73951.pred: To grow lavender, you need to purchase lavender seeds or plants. The average cost of a fully developed lavender plant is around $12 in 2010. However, you can purchase younger specimens for between $4 and $6. Seeds are just as pricey. Depending on how many plants you want to grow, you can expect to spend $200 for 10,000 seeds. Lavender prefers limey, sandy soil. If your soil is acidic, you will have to add garden lime to it. If your soil is too rich, you will have to add sand and pebbles to the dirt before planting. Lavender also prefers sand and small pebbles to regular wood mulches, so be sure you buy enough of each. Half a cubic foot of sand or pebbles can cost between $3 and $5 in 2010. Lavender does not do well in high humidity because of it being fungi-prone. Therefore, be sure to plant your herb where it will get plenty of sunlight.

74328.question: How To Make a Moscow Mule
74328.gt: To make a Moscow Mule, fill a Collins glass, which is a tall, straight glass, about halfway with ice. Then, squeeze the juice of 1/2 a lime into the glass before throwing in the rind. Pour in 2 fluid ounces of vodka and 5 fluid ounces of ginger beer, then garnish with a wedge of lime to the side of the glass. Serve immediately!
74328.pred: To make a Moscow Mule, you will need a copper mug, vodka, lime juice, ginger beer, and a lime wheel garnish. First, pour 2 ounces of vodka into the copper mug. Then, add 0.75 ounces of lime juice. Top the drink with ginger beer. Finally, garnish the drink with a lime wheel.

74608.question: How To Restore an Old Car
74608.gt: To restore an old car, you'll want to fix any dents, scratches, rust, or chipping paint before you apply a new coat of paint to the entire vehicle. You should also repair and polish any chrome pieces on the car, like the bumper or wheel rims. In addition to fixing up the exterior of the vehicle, you'll need to restore the performance so the car functions properly. That includes the engine, drivetrain, tires, exhaust system, and any faulty belts, hoses, or wires.
74608.pred: To restore an old car, you should first clean the engine and remove any debris. Then, you can add oil to the engine and check the oil level. After that, you can add coolant to the engine and check the coolant level. Finally, you can add water to the engine and check the water level.

74761.question: How To Make a Pipe Out of a Pen
74761.gt: If you want to make a pipe out of a pen, start by finding a metal pen with a removable cartridge and metal tip. Next, unscrew the metal tip and slide it off. Then, pry out the bottom cap and remove the ink cartridge. Once the cartridge is out, flip the metal tip around and insert it into the opening of the pen. Hold the case still with your nondominant hand and use your other index finger or thumb to press down on the outer rim of the metal tip until it's securely in place. This will be the bowl of the pipe. You can add a cigarette filter at the opening on the other end if you prefer a less harsh smoke. Otherwise, this pipe is ready to go!
74761.pred: To make a pipe out of a pen, you will need a pen and a piece of aluminum foil. First, take the pen and cut off the top part of the pen. Then, take a piece of aluminum foil and wrap it around the pen. Make sure to cover the entire pen with the foil. Once you have covered the pen, you can use it as a pipe.

74903.question: How To Clean Baby Toys
74903.gt: To clean baby toys, machine wash and dry any plush toys unless the label says not to. In that case, you can spot clean plush toys using dish soap and a wet cloth. To clean plastic, wooden, or metal toys, wipe them down with soap and water. Scrub any tough stains you encounter with baking soda, dish soap, and vinegar. You should also sanitize plastic, wooden, and metal toys by cleaning them with 1 tablespoon of bleach diluted in 1 quart of water. Then, let the toys air dry for at least 24 hours.
74903.pred: To clean baby toys, first, fill a sink with water and add a few drops of dish soap. Then, place the toys in the water and scrub them with a cloth. After that, rinse the toys with water and dry them with a towel.

75279.question: How To Use a Dehumidifier
75279.gt: To use your dehumidifier, put it in the most humid room in your house, like the bathroom, laundry room, or basement. Try to place your dehumidifier as close to the center of the room as you can, or at least 6-12 inches away from walls and furniture, since it will work better when there’s good air flow around it. Run your dehumidifier in the summer with the room’s doors and windows closed. If your machine drains through a hose, place the hose securely in a sink or tub. Otherwise, remember to empty the water reservoir tray regularly.
75279.pred: To use a dehumidifier, first, ensure that the room temperature is at least 65 degrees Fahrenheit. Then, plug in the dehumidifier and turn it on. The dehumidifier will start to remove moisture from the air. You can monitor the humidity level on the control panel. If the humidity level is too high, the dehumidifier will continue to operate. Once the desired humidity level is reached, you can turn off the dehumidifier.

75317.question: How To Make Ambrosia
75317.gt: To make an ambrosia salad, start by washing your grapes and draining the canned fruit. In a mixing bowl, combine sour cream and whipped topping using a spoon. Continue stirring as you add the coconut flakes and marshmallows to the mixture, then fold in the grapes and canned fruit. Before serving your salad, chill it in the fridge for 1 hour. To make a yogurt-based salad instead, replace the sour cream and whipped topping with vanilla yogurt, mix in the coconut flakes and marshmallows, and add bite-sized pieces of fruit as desired.
75317.pred: To make ambrosia, you will need to mix water, yeast, and honey in a bowl. Then, add flour and mix until it forms a dough. Knead the dough and let it rest for 30 minutes. After that, roll out the dough and spread olive oil on it. Finally, bake the dough in the oven for 20 minutes at 430 degrees Fahrenheit.

76554.question: How To Grow Hydroponic Tomatoes
76554.gt: To grow hydroponic tomatoes, start your tomato seeds in a nursery tray using rock wool or coconut coir soil. Once your seedlings develop leaves, transfer them to your hydroponic system and add artificial lights. To water your plants, run your water pump at least every 2 1/2 hours. For ideal growing conditions, keep the temperature at about 55 to 75 °F. When your plants flower, pollinate them by hand with a paintbrush.
76554.pred: To grow hydroponic tomatoes, you will need a hydroponic system, which can be a container or a tank filled with nutrient-rich water. You will also need tomato plants, which can be grown from seeds or purchased from a nursery. Once you have your hydroponic system and tomato plants, you will need to place the plants in the nutrient-rich water and monitor the pH level of the water. You will also need to provide the plants with adequate light and temperature, and prune them regularly to promote healthy growth. With proper care, your hydroponic tomato plants should thrive and produce a bountiful harvest.

76558.question: How To Grow Cherry Tomatoes
76558.gt: To grow cherry tomatoes, choose a sunny spot for your planter or garden plot. If you plant from seeds, you can start them indoors for 8-10 weeks before the last average frost date. 95445.question: How To Make Chantilly Cream
95445.gt: To make Chantilly cream, start by mixing 1 cup of cream with 1/3 cup of milk in a large mixing bowl. Then, whip the mixture with a large balloon whisk until it's frothy and soft peaks start to form. Next, add 5-6 tablespoons of caster sugar and 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract to the cream. Finally, continue to whip the cream until stiff peaks start to form.

Once the mixture is fully combined, you will need to let it cool down before transferring it to a jar and storing it in the fridge.

95560.question: How To Make Hoppers
95560.gt: To make hoppers, mix the yeast, sugar, and warm water. Let the mixture sit until foamy, which can take 5-15 minutes. Measure the rice flour and salt into a bowl, then add the yeast mixture and stir. Next, add the coconut milk and stir until smooth. Cover the bowl and let it sit for 2 hours. When the dough has expanded, spread a little oil in a medium-hot pan and add 1/3 cup of the batter, tilting the pan to cover the bottom and sides. Your hopper is done when the edges are brown and the center isn’t runny.
95560.pred: To make hoppers, you will need a jar, a cucumber, a knife, and a pot. First, cut the cucumber into slices and place them in the jar. Then, add the pickling spice to the pot and heat it up. Once the spice is hot, pour it over the cucumber slices in the jar. Finally, let the jar sit for a few days to allow the cucumbers to pickle.

95759.question: How To Make Iced Tea You Can Drink Immediately
95759.gt: To make iced tea you can drink immediately, start by filling a pitcher with 3 cups of cold water and placing it in the fridge. Then, bring 1 cup of water to a boil, and pour it into a heat-proof glass with 4 tea bags. Next, steep the tea for 3-5 minutes before pouring it into the pitcher of cold water. Finally, sweeten your iced tea with honey or simple syrup and enjoy.

95760.question: How To Make Sun Tea
95760.gt: To make sun tea, start by filling a clean, sanitized container with 4 cups of cold water. Next, add 5 teabags of your preferred variety, such as black or herbal tea. Then, place the tea in direct sunlight for 4 hours. Once the tea has brewed, remove the tea bags and add some sugar if you want a sweeter tea. Finally, fill some glasses with ice, then pour in the tea.
95760.pred: To make sun tea, you will need a glass jar, tea bags, and water. First, fill the jar with water and add the tea bags. Then, place the jar in the sun for a few hours. Finally, remove the tea bags and enjoy your refreshing sun tea.

96074.question: How To Make an Ice Cream Cake
96074.gt: To make an ice cream cake, start by making the cake batter, then bake the cake for 35 minutes. Slice the cooled cake crosswise to create 2 thin discs and place them in the freezer for several hours. Next, soften the ice cream for a few minutes at room temperature, then stir it until it has the consistency of spreadable icing. Place 1 cake disc on the plate and spread half the ice cream on top. Then, add the second cake disc and spread on the remaining ice cream. Freeze the cake for 2-4 hours before adding the whipped topping.
96074.pred: To make an ice cream cake, you will need a cake, a bowl of ice cream, and a container of chocolate sauce. First, place the cake in a bowl and scoop the ice cream on top of it. Then, pour the chocolate sauce over the ice cream and cake. Finally, place the cake on a plate and enjoy your delicious ice cream cake.

96144.question: How To Make Vegan Ice Cream
96144.gt: To make vegan ice cream, start by adding bananas, almond milk, and cocoa powder into a food processor. Blend the mix until its smooth and creamy, keeping in mind that you may have to use a spatula to stir the mixture occasionally. Once it’s fully mixed, add vegan chocolate chips before pouring the mixture into a freezer safe container, like a plastic tub. To turn it into ice cream, just set the tub in the freezer for 2 hours to let it harden.

Next, you will need to add in some vanilla extract and stir it in. After that, you will need to add in some vegan chocolate chips and stir it in. Once everything is mixed together, you will need to pour the mixture into a bowl and let it cool down. Once the mixture has cooled down, you can put it in the freezer and let it freeze for a few hours. Once the mixture has frozen, you can scoop it out and enjoy your delicious vegan ice cream.

96233.question: How To Set up a Fish Tank (for Goldfish)
96233.gt: To set up a fish tank for goldfish, choose an aquarium that holds at least 20 gallons. Use smooth gravel as your substrate, and decorate the tank with plants, rocks, and other decor. Goldfish produce a lot of waste, so include a filtration system in your tank. Fill the aquarium with water that’s been treated with a conditioner to remove chlorine and chloramine, and let the water sit for about 2 weeks before you add the goldfish so it can build up beneficial bacteria.

96244.question: How To Press Leaves
96244.gt: To press leaves, start by finding a heavy book that you don't mind getting a little wrinkled or stained. Then, cut out a piece of paper that's the same height as the book and twice the width. Next, fold the piece of paper in half and place your leaf inside of it. Slip the folded paper inside of the book and then set a few other heavy books on top of it. Finally, place the pile of books in a dry place and check on your leaf regularly until it's completely dry.

96247.question: How To Dry Leaves
96247.gt: To dry leaves, start by placing the leaves in between 2 paper towels with none of the leaves overlapping. Then, open a large book and place the paper towels in between its pages. Once the leaves are in place, close the book and stack something heavy on top of it. Check on the leaves once per week until they're dry.

96316.question: How To Fix a Washer That Won't Drain
96316.gt: If you need to fix a washer that won’t drain, pull the washing machine out from the wall and remove the drain hose from the back of the washer. Run a strong stream of water, like from an outdoor hose, through the drain hose to clear any clogs that might be trapped. Replace the hose on the machine and run it on a rinse/drain cycle to see if the problem is fixed. If it isn’t, remove and clean the pump from on your washer.
96316.pred: To fix a washer that won't drain, you should first check if the drain pump is malfunctioning. If it is, you will need to replace the pump. If the pump is functioning correctly, then the drain hose may be obstructed. In this case, you should remove the hose and clean it thoroughly. If the lid switch is defective, you will need to replace it.

96317.question: How To Fix a Washing Machine That Stops Mid‐Cycle
96317.gt: To fix a washing machine that stops mid-cycle, try a master reset by first unplugging the washing machine to reset the computer. After 1 minute, plug your machine back in, then open and close the door 6 times in 12 seconds to signal the computer to reset. To see if the machine is fixed, set it on “small load” with nothing inside, and see if it runs through the entire cycle with no problems.

Next, check the water inlet valve to make sure it is functioning properly. If it is not, replace it. Finally, check the agitator to ensure it is not stuck or damaged. If it is, clean or replace it.

96409.question: How To Bend Sheet Metal
96409.gt: To bend sheet metal in a vice, start by marking a line on the metal where you want to bend it. Next, put your wooden or metal form blocks in the vice and clamp your sheet of metal between the forms. If your sheet metal is long, ask a friend to stabilize the part hanging out from the form blocks so it doesn't affect the bend. Then, tap your metal along the bend line with a rubber or plastic mallet until the sheet bends to the angle you want. If you're working with a thick sheet of metal, apply heat from a blowtorch along the bend line to soften it.
96409.pred: To bend sheet metal, you can use a bending brake, which is a tool that allows you to bend metal sheets into a specific shape. First, you need to measure the sheet metal and mark the desired bend points. Then, place the sheet metal on the bending brake and adjust the brake to the desired angle. Finally, use a hammer to bend the sheet metal along the marked lines. It is important to use caution when using a hammer and to wear protective gear to avoid injury.

96766.question: How To Make Focaccia
96766.gt: To make focaccia, start by mixing yeast, salt, flour, olive oil, and water to make the dough. Then, knead the dough before covering it and proofing it for 2 hours. Next, split the dough in half and flatten each half on a baking sheet drizzled with olive oil. Next, top the focaccia with any herbs, seasonings, or cheese you'd like, and then let it rest for 1 hour. Finally, bake the focaccia for 20 minutes at 425 degrees Fahrenheit.
96766.pred: To make focaccia, you will need to mix flour, water, and yeast in a bowl. Then, knead the dough until it becomes smooth and elastic. After that, you can add olive oil and herbs to the dough and let it rise for a few hours. Once the dough has risen, you can shape it into a loaf and bake it in the oven. Finally, you can top the focaccia with tomatoes, black olives, and basil leaves before serving.

97035.question: How To Make Catsicles
97035.gt: To make catsicles, first mix goat’s milk, wet cat food, and tuna in a bowl. You can also mix in some cat treats to make your catsicles extra special. Next, pour the mix into individual containers, like Dixie cups, ice cube trays or popsicle molds. Then, cover them with plastic wrap or Tupperware and place them flat in your freezer for at least 24 hours before serving.

97458.question: How To Make KFC Original Fried Chicken
97458.gt: To make KFC original fried chicken, start by blending salt, thyme, basil, oregano, celery salt, black pepper, dried mustard, paprika, garlic salt, ground ginger, and white pepper in a food processor. Then, combine the seasoning with some flour in a bowl. Once you've made the breading, dip the chicken into an egg-buttermilk mixture and then the breading. Finally, fry the chicken in vegetable oil until it's cooked through and crispy.
97458.pred: To make KFC original fried chicken, you will need to follow the steps shown in the video. First, you will need to prepare the ingredients, which include flour, salt, pepper, and oil. 97467.question: How To Make Fried Chicken in the Oven
97467.gt: To make oven-fried chicken with breadcrumbs, start by whisking egg and milk together in a shallow prep bowl and setting aside. In another bowl, whisk together flour, breadcrumbs, baking powder, and seasonings to make a dry coating. Next, cover the chicken in the egg mixture and dip each piece into the dry coating twice. Then, bake the chicken in a heated, buttered pan at 410°F for 10 to 12 minutes. Finally, flip the chicken over and bake for another 5 to 10 minutes.
